Money Mutual > Montel Williams
  • Payday Loans
  • Cash Advance
  • Bad Credit Loans
  • Montel Williams
    • About Montel Williams
 

Montel Williams Endorses Money Mutual

Many people who know Montel Williams remember him as the host of the long-running talk show The Montel Williams Show. But Montel remains in the public limelight by continuing to be outspoken on a number of issues, and also the spokesperson for MoneyMutual. He has been quite outspoken over the years for finding ways to help those in need.

Montel has endorsed MoneyMutual because it helps provide people who have no other short-term cash alternatives, access to lenders who offer payday loans and cash advances. Short-term loans can provide an option to those who experience an emergency situation and find it difficult to pay expenses due to lack of funds or credit.

Montel has always taken pride in being able to provide people with information to help them live better physically, spiritually, financially, and emotionally. He understands that people encounter unexpected expenses in life, and having access to that emergency cash when they need it the most, can really make a difference. Williams has spent a great deal of his life helping others, from his career in the military to his founding of the MS Foundation to his work with a wide variety of charities. He continues to support products and companies that are able to help people who are in dire financial conditions.

In many cases, a payday loan may be the answer to a bad financial situation and may help you avoid making the situation worse. Because cash advances have helped to so many people in financial crisis, Montel Williams endorses Money Mutual and the loan matching service it provides. He also promotes the idea of choosing and using payday loans and short term cash advances in a responsible manner.
 

"Montel Williams endorses Money Mutual and the loan matching service it provides"
Montel knows that there are many reasons why people choose a cash advance. More often than not, it is a temporary method of dealing with unexpected expenses like a mechanic’s bill or a medical bill. When used responsibly and paid back promptly, the loan can be a sensible way of handling unexpected expenses and that is why so many people choose to make use of it.

 

Understanding how a payday loan works is important before you make the decision to apply. Be sure to ask yourself if this type of loan could help you with your current financial situation and if you will be able to pay it back on time. If you have an unexpected expense and you still have some time before payday, it certainly could help you a great deal.

Rather than bounce a check, or receive late payment penalties, Montel believes that getting a short term cash loan from MoneyMutual''s network of participating lenders can help provide the immediate assistance to avoid expensive fees. According to Montel Williams, "MoneyMutual''s online lending network is the only source you can trust for finding a short term loan quickly and easily." Visit our Montel Williams biography page for more information.

Money Mutual > Montel Williams
  • Payday Loans
  • Cash Advance
  • Bad Credit Loans
  • Montel Williams
    • About Montel Williams
 

Montel Williams Endorses Money Mutual

Many people who know Montel Williams remember him as the host of the long-running talk show The Montel Williams Show. But Montel remains in the public limelight by continuing to be outspoken on a number of issues, and also the spokesperson for MoneyMutual. He has been quite outspoken over the years for finding ways to help those in need.

Montel has endorsed MoneyMutual because it helps provide people who have no other short-term cash alternatives, access to lenders who offer payday loans and cash advances. Short-term loans can provide an option to those who experience an emergency situation and find it difficult to pay expenses due to lack of funds or credit.

Montel has always taken pride in being able to provide people with information to help them live better physically, spiritually, financially, and emotionally. He understands that people encounter unexpected expenses in life, and having access to that emergency cash when they need it the most, can really make a difference. Williams has spent a great deal of his life helping others, from his career in the military to his founding of the MS Foundation to his work with a wide variety of charities. He continues to support products and companies that are able to help people who are in dire financial conditions.

In many cases, a payday loan may be the answer to a bad financial situation and may help you avoid making the situation worse. Because cash advances have helped to so many people in financial crisis, Montel Williams endorses Money Mutual and the loan matching service it provides. He also promotes the idea of choosing and using payday loans and short term cash advances in a responsible manner.
 

"Montel Williams endorses Money Mutual and the loan matching service it provides"
Montel knows that there are many reasons why people choose a cash advance. More often than not, it is a temporary method of dealing with unexpected expenses like a mechanic’s bill or a medical bill. When used responsibly and paid back promptly, the loan can be a sensible way of handling unexpected expenses and that is why so many people choose to make use of it.

 

Understanding how a payday loan works is important before you make the decision to apply. Be sure to ask yourself if this type of loan could help you with your current financial situation and if you will be able to pay it back on time. If you have an unexpected expense and you still have some time before payday, it certainly could help you a great deal.

Rather than bounce a check, or receive late payment penalties, Montel believes that getting a short term cash loan from MoneyMutual''s network of participating lenders can help provide the immediate assistance to avoid expensive fees. According to Montel Williams, "MoneyMutual''s online lending network is the only source you can trust for finding a short term loan quickly and easily." Visit our Montel Williams biography page for more information.

 

', 1, GETDATE(), GETDATE()); DELETE FROM Article WHERE ArticleId = 2068292710944334262; INSERT INTO Article ([ArticleId] ,[DateCreated] ,[DateModified] ,[ArticlePageId] ,[Title] ,[MetaDescription] ,[MetaKeywords] ,[HeaderImageAltText] ,[HtmlContentId] ,[ManagementApproved] ,[LegalApproved] ,[Author] ,[Revision] ,[UrlAccessible] ,[LiveAccessible] ,[WebsiteId] ,[PageName] ,[HeaderContent] ,[MainTemplate] ,[MobileTemplate] ,[ModalTemplate] ,[MobileUserExperienceId] ,[SerializedArticleRegions] ) VALUES (2068292710944334262 ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,NULL ,'Montel Williams Endorsed Cash Advance & Payday Loans | MoneyMutual' ,'Montel Williams has endorsed MoneyMutual, which helps people find cash advance and payday loans quickly and easily.' ,'Montel Williams Payday Loans, Montel Williams Cash Advance, Montel Williams Loan, Money Mutual, Montell, MoneyMutual' ,'' ,1497436531910853302 ,1 ,1 ,'david.maple' ,1 ,1 ,1 ,5484604087494250496 ,'montel-williams/' ,' ' ,'/templates/Silo.xhtml' ,'/mobile/MobileSilo.xhtml' ,'/templates/ModalArticleTemplate.xhtml' ,3226773266688846570 ,'' ); -- article page DELETE FROM ArticlePage WHERE ArticlePageId = 226224310196702066; INSERT INTO ArticlePage ([ArticlePageId] ,[DateCreated] ,[WebsiteId] ,[PageName] ,[Active] ,[LiveArticleId] ,[TestArticleId] ,[UrlAccessible] ,[LiveAccessible] ,[Locale]) VALUES (226224310196702066 ,GETDATE() ,5484604087494250496 ,'montel-williams/' ,1 ,2101384007965770804 ,2068292710944334262 ,1 ,1 ,'en'); /* =========================================================== */ /* MoneyMutual.com/loan-fees-and-repayment.html */ /* =========================================================== */ -- live article DELETE FROM HtmlContent WHERE HtmlContentId = 232739465274749291; INSERT INTO HtmlContent (HtmlContentId, Name, Text, Active, DateCreated, DateModified) VALUES (232739465274749291, 'live version: loan-fees-and-repayment', '

Information about short-term loans

This page offers information on MoneyMutual and the types of lenders we work with as well as the types of loans that they provide. As you review this information, please keep in mind that MoneyMutual is not a lender.

Above all else, please use short-term loans responsibly!

What is MoneyMutual?

MoneyMutual is a FREE service that connects borrowers with lenders. That means that when you submit your information using our website, your mobile device or by speaking with one of our friendly agents on the phone, MoneyMutual will do its absolute best to connect you with a lender that can deposit money directly into your bank account by the next business day.

MoneyMutual has the ability to connect you with over 60 short-term lenders that often can make a real-time decision about providing you a loan.

 

 

 

What kind of lenders can MoneyMutual match me with?

MoneyMutual works with many types of lenders and each offers different types of loan products. Most of these lenders offer short-term loans that are meant to last about 2 to 4 weeks, depending on which lender you are matched with.

Those who are approved are often offered somewhere between $300 - $1000 depending on factors like your monthly income, how long you have had your job, etc. These loans are also sometimes referred to as payday loans, cash advance loans, payday advances, etc.

In addition, to better serve the needs of our customers, MoneyMutual has also partnered with lenders that offer other types of loan products, such as: installment loans, lines of credit, title loans, and auto equity loans.

How much do I have to pay back? What is the APR?

Since MoneyMutual is not a lender, we are not able to provide or advertise the actual terms, rates, annual percentage rates (APRs), or fees associated with the loan you may receive. The reason for this is that the terms, rates, APRs and fees vary from lender to lender.

If we are able to match you with a lender, you will be shown this information by that lender when we connect you with them.

Please review this information carefully and make sure that you understand how much money you will receive and how much you are required to payback.

Each lender should provide its loan terms clearly and in a way that is easy to understand. If you do not understand the terms of the loan or don’t agree with them (including the APR), do not continue or agree to the terms and do not provide your electronic signature.

You are not obligated to accept the terms for any reason; however, you will not receive the loan if you do not agree.

What happens if I don’t pay the loan back on time or don’t pay it back at all?

If you accept the terms and conditions of the loan offered to you by the lender you are matched with, you are agreeing to pay that loan back. Partial payment, non-payment or late payment of your loan may result in additional fees, legal collection action, or your failure to pay being reported to a consumer reporting agency.

Every lender has different terms and conditions for their loans. Most lenders are willing to work with you if you should need some help. If you have questions or need more information, please call your lender directly. Let them know that you were matched with them through MoneyMutual, and they will be happy to help. If you have any issue contacting them, please let us know.

What is the renewal policy for these types of loans?

Renewal policies are different for every lender. As a convenience to you, some lenders may agree to alternative payment options. Some options may result in a renewed loan and additional loan fees. Please make sure to review your lender''s renewal policies, and make your payment preferences known to your lender. If you have questions or need more information on renewal policies, please call your lender directly. Let them know that you were matched with them through MoneyMutual, and they will be happy to help. If you have any issue contacting them, please let us know.

MoneyMutual provides its services in compliance with Federal and applicable law. We work hard to provide a quick and easy service for our customers. If you have any questions, issues or concerns, please contact us immediately at (800)741-3300 or customerservice@moneymutual.com.

You may also contact us via snail mail at the address below:

MoneyMutual
8174 S. Las Vegas Blvd. Suite #109-432
Las Vegas, NV 89123

The reason for this is that the terms, rates, APRs and fees vary from lender to lender.' ,'Payday Loans Fees and Repayment, Money Mutual Fees' ,'' ,232739465274749291 ,1 ,1 ,'david.maple' ,1 ,1 ,1 ,5484604087494250496 ,'loan-fees-and-repayment' ,' ' ,'/templates/ArticleTemplate.xhtml' ,'/mobile/MobileTextArticleTemplate.xhtml' ,'/templates/ModalArticleTemplate.xhtml' ,4226031607992819372 ,'' ); -- test article DELETE FROM HtmlContent WHERE HtmlContentId = 232739465274749290; INSERT INTO HtmlContent (HtmlContentId, Name, Text, Active, DateCreated, DateModified) VALUES (232739465274749290, 'test version: loan-fees-and-repayment', '

Information about short-term loans

This page offers information on MoneyMutual and the types of lenders we work with as well as the types of loans that they provide. As you review this information, please keep in mind that MoneyMutual is not a lender.

Above all else, please use short-term loans responsibly!

What is MoneyMutual?

MoneyMutual is a FREE service that connects borrowers with lenders. That means that when you submit your information using our website, your mobile device or by speaking with one of our friendly agents on the phone, MoneyMutual will do its absolute best to connect you with a lender that can deposit money directly into your bank account by the next business day.

MoneyMutual has the ability to connect you with over 60 short-term lenders that often can make a real-time decision about providing you a loan.

 

 

 

What kind of lenders can MoneyMutual match me with?

MoneyMutual works with many types of lenders and each offers different types of loan products. Most of these lenders offer short-term loans that are meant to last about 2 to 4 weeks, depending on which lender you are matched with.

Those who are approved are often offered somewhere between $300 - $1000 depending on factors like your monthly income, how long you have had your job, etc. These loans are also sometimes referred to as payday loans, cash advance loans, payday advances, etc.

How much do I have to pay back? What is the APR?

Since MoneyMutual is not a lender, we are not able to provide or advertise the actual terms, rates, annual percentage rates (APRs), or fees associated with the loan you may receive. The reason for this is that the terms, rates, APRs and fees vary from lender to lender.

If we are able to match you with a lender, you will be shown this information by that lender when we connect you with them.

Please review this information carefully and make sure that you understand how much money you will receive and how much you are required to payback.

What happens if I don’t pay the loan back on time or don’t pay it back at all?

If you accept the terms and conditions of the loan offered to you by the lender you are matched with, you are agreeing to pay that loan back. Partial payment, non-payment or late payment of your loan may result in additional fees, legal collection action, or your failure to pay being reported to a consumer reporting agency.

Every lender has different terms and conditions for their loans. Most lenders are willing to work with you if you should need some help. If you have questions or need more information, please call your lender directly. Let them know that you were matched with them through MoneyMutual, and they will be happy to help. If you have any issue contacting them, please let us know.

Renewal policies are different for every lender. As a convenience to you, some lenders may agree to alternative payment options. Some options may result in a renewed loan and additional loan fees. Please make sure to review your lender''s renewal policies, and make your payment preferences known to your lender. If you have questions or need more information on renewal policies, please call your lender directly. Let them know that you were matched with them through MoneyMutual, and they will be happy to help. If you have any issue contacting them, please let us know.

MoneyMutual provides its services in compliance with Federal and applicable law. We work hard to provide a quick and easy service for our customers. If you have any questions, issues or concerns, please contact us immediately at (800)741-3300 or customerservice@moneymutual.com.

You may also contact us via snail mail at the address below:

MoneyMutual
8174 S. Las Vegas Blvd. Suite #109-432
Las Vegas, NV 89123

How It Works

MoneyMutual is NOT a lender. Instead, we have built one of the nation''s largest networks of online short-term lenders. After submitting your information, if you are matched with a lender, MoneyMutual will redirect to the lender''s web site where you will be able to review loan terms and conditions. In many cases, the lender will then contact you to confirm your personal information and finalize the loan. They may contact you via telephone, email, text messages, etc. Please make sure that you respond in a timely manner to ensure that funds are deposited as quickly as possible.

 

Any questions about loan repayment, schedule and/or fees should be directed to the lender. If you have any questions about applying for a loan, we can be reached at #{controllerBean.customerServicePhoneNumber}. Remember – MoneyMutual is not a lender, and will not be able to provide any information regarding loan repayment, schedules, fees or other loan details.

 

 

', 1, GETDATE(), GETDATE()); DELETE FROM Article WHERE ArticleId = 302315738252812390; INSERT INTO Article ([ArticleId] ,[DateCreated] ,[DateModified] ,[ArticlePageId] ,[Title] ,[MetaDescription] ,[MetaKeywords] ,[HeaderImageAltText] ,[HtmlContentId] ,[ManagementApproved] ,[LegalApproved] ,[Author] ,[Revision] ,[UrlAccessible] ,[LiveAccessible] ,[WebsiteId] ,[PageName] ,[HeaderContent] ,[MainTemplate] ,[MobileTemplate] ,[ModalTemplate] ,[MobileUserExperienceId] ,[SerializedArticleRegions] ) VALUES (302315738252812390 ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,NULL ,'How Do You Get A Payday Loan? | MoneyMutual Lender Matching Service ' ,'Once you''ve submitted your information, if you are matched with a lender, MoneyMutual will redirect to the lender''s web site where you will be able to review loan terms and conditions.' ,'How Do You Get A Payday Loan, MoneyMutual Service' ,'' ,302315738252812390 ,1 ,1 ,'david.maple' ,1 ,1 ,1 ,5484604087494250496 ,'how-it-works' ,'' ,'/templates/ArticleTemplate.xhtml' ,'/mobile/MobileTextArticleTemplate.xhtml' ,'/templates/ModalArticleTemplate.xhtml' ,4226031607992819372 ,'' ); -- test article DELETE FROM HtmlContent WHERE HtmlContentId = 302315738252812389; INSERT INTO HtmlContent (HtmlContentId, Name, Text, Active, DateCreated, DateModified) VALUES (302315738252812389, 'test version: how-it-works', '

How It Works

MoneyMutual is NOT a lender. Instead, we have built one of the nation''s largest networks of online short-term lenders. After submitting your information, if you are matched with a lender, MoneyMutual will redirect to the lender''s web site where you will be able to review loan terms and conditions. In many cases, the lender will then contact you to confirm your personal information and finalize the loan. They may contact you via telephone, email, text messages, etc. Please make sure that you respond in a timely manner to ensure that funds are deposited as quickly as possible.

 

Any questions about loan repayment, schedule and/or fees should be directed to the lender. If you have any questions about applying for a loan, we can be reached at #{controllerBean.customerServicePhoneNumber}. Remember – MoneyMutual is not a lender, and will not be able to provide any information regarding loan repayment, schedules, fees or other loan details.

Apply 24/7

Do you have an unexpected car repair? Maybe you have an unexpectedly large bill due, and your next payday is too far away? At Money Mutual, we can help you get matched with one of the largest lending networks in the country – safely, quickly, and securely – from your phone.

How does Money Mutual work? Easy! It takes mere minutes to provide all the appropriate information, and if we''re able to match you with a lender, you could be approved in moments. If you''re matched with a lender from our dedicated network, and you''re approved, you could receive up to $1000* in as little as 24 hours. We make getting matched with a lender on your phone quick, safe, and secure.

The best part is that you don''t have to wait in line! Helping to match you with one of our participating lenders from your phone means you don’t have to go to the store and stand forever in line to get the cash you need. Getting matched with a lender is only a few finger presses away!

The evolution of smartphones has made it simpler than ever to get the emergency cash you''re looking for. Money Mutual helps connect you with one of the largest lending networks in the country, all from the ease of your phone. Let us help you get matched so you can get the funds you need to get on with your life.

Money Mutual > Cash Advance > Different Names of Cash Advance Loans
  • Payday Loans
  • Cash Advance
    • What Is A No Fax Advance?
    • Cash Advance Installment Loans
    • Cash Advance Online
    • How Cash Advance Loans Work
    • Fast Cash Advance Loans
    • Different Names of Cash Advance Loans
    • Cash vs. Credit Card Advance
    • Business Cash Advance Loans
  • Bad Credit Loans
  • Montel Williams
 

Different Names for Cash Advance Loans


Even if the economy has left you with bad credit, you have options for being able to get a loan for an unexpected emergency. One of the various kinds of loans you may qualify for is a cash advance loan online. Cash advance loans are useful for emergencies like a car repair or a medical crisis, and if used responsibly, can be a way to get quick cash.

There are many different names for cash advance loans. You may already be familiar with a typical cash advance from a short term lender: providing some basic information such as your bank statement and pay stub (or other requirements that can vary from lender to lender), then the lender makes a decision on your loan. If you are approved and you accept the loan offer, you could have the funds deposited into your account in as little as 24 hours in some cases. Here are some of the different names for cash advance loans:

  • Credit Card Cash Advance: Many credit card companies offer a cash advance limit along with a line of credit. This cash advance limit allows you to pull emergency cash from a bank or an ATM machine.
  • Paycheck Advance: Some people choose a paycheck as a cash advance option. This involves taking money from your next paycheck in advance for faster cash. Their next paycheck will reflect the funds that were taken out for the advance.
  • Cash Advance Installment Loan: Much like a typical cash advance loan, a cash advance installment loan involves supplying similar information as a cash advance (though that information varies from lender to lender), but the loan has a fixed payment schedule.
  • Business Cash Advance: For those who are entrepreneurs or are already business owners, a business cash advance may be an option to inject cash to help jump start or pay for an unexpected business emergency.
  • Payday Loans: One of the most common types of cash advance loans is a payday loan. If you have submitted the relevant information and are approved for the loan, repayment on the loan is expected on your next payday.

"The first step in getting a cash advance is finding the right lender for your needs"
The first step in getting a cash advance is finding the right lender for your needs. That''s where Money Mutual comes in. While we are not a lender, we connect people with a large network of lenders who may be able to get them the emergency cash they''re looking for. Then decide from the different types of cash advance loans available and how much cash you need. With the relevant information, approval is possible within minutes and funds can be directly deposited into your checking account in as little as 24 hours. Remember to use cash advance loans responsibly.

Even though many people have had their credit go bad due to the economy, that doesn''t mean they don''t have options when it comes to getting a loan, and cash advance loans are just one of the options out there. Money Mutual helps connect people with a large network of lenders who may be able to help them get the funds they need quickly, securely and safely.

', 1, GETDATE(), GETDATE()); DELETE FROM Article WHERE ArticleId = 3490596983811007259; INSERT INTO Article ([ArticleId] ,[DateCreated] ,[DateModified] ,[ArticlePageId] ,[Title] ,[MetaDescription] ,[MetaKeywords] ,[HeaderImageAltText] ,[HtmlContentId] ,[ManagementApproved] ,[LegalApproved] ,[Author] ,[Revision] ,[UrlAccessible] ,[LiveAccessible] ,[WebsiteId] ,[PageName] ,[HeaderContent] ,[MainTemplate] ,[MobileTemplate] ,[ModalTemplate] ,[MobileUserExperienceId] ,[SerializedArticleRegions] ) VALUES (3490596983811007259 ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,NULL ,'What are the Different Names for Cash Advance Loans? | Money Mutual' ,'There are many names for cash advance loans available for borrowers. Learn about the different types of cash advance loans you can get online at Money Mutual.' ,'Different Names of Cash Advance Loans, Different Types of Cash Advance Loans, Cash Advance Loan Online, Cash Advance Installment Loan, Cash Advance Loans, Cash Advance, Payday Loans, Money Mutual' ,'' ,28239137923410471 ,1 ,1 ,'david.maple' ,1 ,1 ,1 ,5484604087494250496 ,'cash-advance/different-names' ,'' ,'/templates/Silo.xhtml' ,'/mobile/MobileSilo.xhtml' ,'/templates/ModalArticleTemplate.xhtml' ,3226773266688846570 ,'' ); -- test article DELETE FROM HtmlContent WHERE HtmlContentId = 1108265904227396397; INSERT INTO HtmlContent (HtmlContentId, Name, Text, Active, DateCreated, DateModified) VALUES (1108265904227396397, 'Article Test: 1108265904227396397', '

Ready to Use Your MyMoneyMutual Cash Card?

Welcome! We know that many people these days may need up to $1,000 fast, especially in times like these.

Sometimes life hands you emergencies that are beyond your control – whether you have an unexpected expense, your bills are piling up, or you just need to get by until your next payday – and you don''t have time to wait in line and deal with the hassle and embarrassment of the payday loan store. You aren''t the only one! That''s where your Emergency Cash Card from MyMoneyMutual could come in handy.

“short-term cash loans, sometimes referred to as bad credit loans, may be a viable choice ”

By entering the Reservation Number on your Emergency Cash Card and submitting your information, you may be able to be matched with a participating lender in one of the largest lending networks in the country, and you could possibly have up to $1,000 directly deposited into your bank account in as little as 24 hours! The Reservation Number is exclusively for you, and it''s easy to get started by entering it and following the instructions. Within minutes, you could be approved by a participating lender!

How does the process work? Just enter your number and follow the instructions. The process is easy and only takes minutes. Once you''ve finished filling out your information, just click to submit. Based on the information you provide, you may be matched with a participating lender. If you are matched with a lender, you''ll be forwarded on to the lender''s website, where you''ll be able to apply for a loan. It''s possible the lender may ask you for additional information like your email address, home address, and phone number.

If you''re approved, the lender will provide you with the terms and conditions of your loan offer. These terms will include details such as finance charges, fees, the interest rate, and more. Remember, you have a choice to accept or decline your loan offer. If you don''t agree to the terms and conditions of the loan offer, you are not obligated to accept it. Make sure you read over the loan terms carefully and that you understand them fully. The lender should send you its contact information along with the loan offer, so if you have any questions, you should contact the lender directly. If you make the choice to accept the loan offer, you could possibly have the money directly deposited into your bank account in as little as 24 hours.

We strongly encourage responsible borrowing. One of the best ways to do that is to make sure you are able to repay the loan on time and in full. You can avoid further charges by ensuring that you have the money in your account. If you think there is a possibility you won''t be able to repay the loan on time, contact the lender directly at the contact information they''ve provided.

At MoneyMutual, we know that going online for emergency cash can be easier and more convenient than driving to the payday store. Why use My Money Mutual?

  • Privacy. From the privacy of your laptop, home computer or mobile device, you don''t have to wait in embarrassing lines to get the money you need. We''ve teamed up with McAfee, one of the industry leaders in privacy protection on the web, to help make sure your information is kept safe from prying eyes.
  • Speed. We know you don''t have time to wait in line at the payday store. The submission process takes mere minutes, and approval is made in real time – meaning you could have the money you need in as little as 24 hours.
  • Security. We use McAfee Secure to scan our site daily for identity thieves and bad software. We also use secure verification to help keep your information protected.

Ready to go? Just enter your Reservation Number on your MyMoneyMutual card and get started. You could possibly have the emergency cash you need in as little as 24 hours!

For more information please see the HOW IT WORKS section of our website.

Ready to Use Your MyMoneyMutual Cash Card?

Welcome! We know that many people these days may need up to $1,000 fast, especially in times like these.

Sometimes life hands you emergencies that are beyond your control – whether you have an unexpected expense, your bills are piling up, or you just need to get by until your next payday – and you don''t have time to wait in line and deal with the hassle and embarrassment of the payday loan store. For more information please see the HOW IT WORKS section of our website.

Fast Cash Advance Payday Loans


Life always has a way of throwing curveballs at you: maybe you need rent money or a family member has an emergency medical calamity, and payday is too far away. You need cash quickly, and don''t want to wait in long, embarrassing lines. There are options when going online to get fast cash advance payday loans. Some short term lenders offer quick cash advance payday loans online that can be approved in minutes. Getting matched with a lender can be easy at Money Mutual. We have created one of the largest lending networks in the U.S. who offer alternatives to finance charges or bounced checks.

We are not involved in any of the decision making process for your loan, as we are not a lender or loan broker. What we do is help match you with a short term lender who might be able to get you a cash advance loan quickly, safely, and privately.

"You need cash quickly, and don''t want to wait in long, embarrassing lines"
One of the advantages of getting a cash advance payday loan online is that the process can be very quick. Submitting all the required information sometimes takes less than 5 minutes, and approval is sometimes made within minutes of submission. If you are matched with a lender, the lender may contact you by text, email, or phone with additional questions. Remember, requirements can vary from lender to lender. While having consistent income from a retirement check or steady job as well as a checking account may be necessary, other requirements may apply.

If you are presented with a loan offer, make sure you take your time to read it over carefully. The loan documents will contain specific information about your loan including the amount of the loan, repayment dates, and any fees associated with it. If you decide to accept the loan offer, the funds could be deposited into your account in as little as 24 hours. Remember, always use cash advance payday loans responsibly.

When life hands you the unexpected, don''t forget that you have options! You may be able to get a quick cash advance payday loan to help you possibly get the funds you need fast. Money Mutual may be able to help match you with the right kind of lender for your needs when you need a fast cash advance payday loan, and payday is too far away.

Fast Cash Advance Payday Loans


Life always has a way of throwing curveballs at you: maybe you need rent money or a family member has an emergency medical calamity, and payday is too far away. You need cash quickly, and don''t want to wait in long, embarrassing lines. There are options when going online to get fast cash advance payday loans. Some short term lenders offer quick cash advance payday loans online that can be approved in minutes. Getting matched with a lender can be easy at Money Mutual. We have created one of the largest lending networks in the U.S. who offer alternatives to finance charges or bounced checks.

We are not involved in any of the decision making process for your loan, as we are not a lender or loan broker. What we do is help match you with a short term lender who might be able to get you a cash advance loan quickly, safely, and privately.

"You need cash quickly, and don''t want to wait in long, embarrassing lines"
One of the advantages of getting a cash advance payday loan online is that the process can be very quick. Submitting all the required information sometimes takes less than 5 minutes, and approval is sometimes made within minutes of submission. If you are matched with a lender, the lender may contact you by text, email, or phone with additional questions. Remember, requirements can vary from lender to lender. While having consistent income from a retirement check or steady job as well as a checking account may be necessary, other requirements may apply.

If you are presented with a loan offer, make sure you take your time to read it over carefully. The loan documents will contain specific information about your loan including the amount of the loan, repayment dates, and any fees associated with it. If you decide to accept the loan offer, the funds could be deposited into your account in as little as 24 hours. Remember, always use cash advance payday loans responsibly.

When life hands you the unexpected, don''t forget that you have options! You may be able to get a quick cash advance payday loan to help you possibly get the funds you need fast. Money Mutual may be able to help match you with the right kind of lender for your needs when you need a fast cash advance payday loan, and payday is too far away.

Money Mutual > Bad Credit Loans > Emergency Loans
  • Payday Loans
  • Cash Advance
  • Bad Credit Loans
    • Qualify for Payday Loans With Bad Credit
    • Payday Loans With Bad Credit?
    • Bad Credit Loans
    • Unsecured Installment Loans
    • Online Unsecured Installment Loans
    • Loans With Bad Credit
    • Guaranteed Bad Credit Loans
    • How to Get a Cash Advance
    • Can You Get a Short Term Loan?
    • Emergency Loans
    • Types of Bad Credit Loans
    • Are There Loans If You Have Bad Credit?
  • Montel Williams
 

Emergency Bad Credit Loans


These tough economic times have brought about many struggles for a number of people, causing them to fall into bad credit. Sometimes your car has some trouble and needs repair fast, or maybe you need some emergency rent money. If the economy has caused your credit to go bad, and you need money for an unexpected emergency, you have choices. You may need an emergency bad credit loan, and Money Mutual may be able to help match you with a lender.

At Money Mutual, we''ve partnered with a variety of participating lenders who may be able to approve you for an emergency loan, even if you have bad credit. The process only takes a few minutes and is absolutely free. Depending on the lender, you may be able to get up to $1000 in as little as 24 hours for a personal loan. While MoneyMutual is not a lender, we can help to match you with a lender who can possibly get you emergency cash safely, quickly, and securely.

Because the economy has caused bad credit for many people, some lenders understand your situation and may be able to help you get the cash you need. If you have a steady job, a paystub to prove it, and a checking account at a bank or credit union, and meet lender minimum requirements, you may be able to apply for a loan (though keep in mind that other conditions may apply). Participating lenders will require you to be at least 18 years or older in order to be eligible for emergency bad credit loans.

"you may be able to get up to $1000 in as little as 24 hours"

Using MoneyMutual.com to find the right lender for you is absolutely free, and if you''re matched with a participating lender, you''ll be taken to the lender''s website to complete the process. Most lenders -- upon your acceptance of the loan offer terms -- will deposit your loan directly into your checking account, allowing you quick access to the money so that you can take care of your emergency situation.

Always read the terms and conditions of your loan offer carefully before accepting the loan offer, and remember to borrow responsibly. Your loan offer will include all of the details of your loan, including payment due dates as well as any extra charges or fees associated with it. Always ask your lender about the terms of your loan if you have any questions. Also, if something happens and you find yourself needing extra time to repay the loan or make a scheduled payment, contact your lender directly and advise them of your situation.

Sometimes life can throw you a curve ball and you may need some emergency cash. If you''re afraid to apply for an emergency bad credit loan because you''ve been turned down by the bank or credit union, know that you have options – and that you are not alone. Using Money Mutual''s free service can help connect you with a lender who may be able to get the emergency funds you need.

Emergency Bad Credit Loans


These tough economic times have brought about many struggles for a number of people, causing them to fall into bad credit. Sometimes your car has some trouble and needs repair fast, or maybe you need some emergency rent money. If the economy has caused your credit to go bad, and you need money for an unexpected emergency, you have choices. You may need an emergency bad credit loan, and Money Mutual may be able to help match you with a lender.

At Money Mutual, we''ve partnered with a variety of participating lenders who may be able to approve you for an emergency loan, even if you have bad credit. The process only takes a few minutes and is absolutely free. Depending on the lender, you may be able to get up to $1000 in as little as 24 hours for a personal loan. While MoneyMutual is not a lender, we can help to match you with a lender who can possibly get you emergency cash safely, quickly, and securely.

Because the economy has caused bad credit for many people, some lenders understand your situation and may be able to help you get the cash you need. If you have a steady job, a paystub to prove it, and a checking account at a bank or credit union, and meet lender minimum requirements, you may be able to apply for a loan (though keep in mind that other conditions may apply). Participating lenders will require you to be at least 18 years or older in order to be eligible for emergency bad credit loans.

"you may be able to get up to $1000 in as little as 24 hours"

Using MoneyMutual.com to find the right lender for you is absolutely free, and if you''re matched with a participating lender, you''ll be taken to the lender''s website to complete the process. Most lenders -- upon your acceptance of the loan offer terms -- will deposit your loan directly into your checking account, allowing you quick access to the money so that you can take care of your emergency situation.

Always read the terms and conditions of your loan offer carefully before accepting the loan offer, and remember to borrow responsibly. Your loan offer will include all of the details of your loan, including payment due dates as well as any extra charges or fees associated with it. Always ask your lender about the terms of your loan if you have any questions. Also, if something happens and you find yourself needing extra time to repay the loan or make a scheduled payment, contact your lender directly and advise them of your situation.

Sometimes life can throw you a curve ball and you may need some emergency cash. If you''re afraid to apply for an emergency bad credit loan because you''ve been turned down by the bank or credit union, know that you have options – and that you are not alone. Using Money Mutual''s free service can help connect you with a lender who may be able to get the emergency funds you need.

Money Mutual > Montel Williams > About Montel Williams
  • Payday Loans
  • Cash Advance
  • Bad Credit Loans
  • Montel Williams
    • About Montel Williams
 

Montel Williams Biography


Montel Williams is one of the most recognized television personalities in the world after having conducted more than 30,000 interviews. He hosted “The Montel Williams Show,” a syndicated talk show that was distributed for 17 years by CBS Paramount Television.  Williams taped more than 3,500 shows and was known for focusing on problems confronting ordinary people as they coped with financial problems, joblessness, illness and other issues.

Williams, born July 3, 1956, knows first-hand about personal problems.  He has multiple sclerosis, but maintains a hectic work schedule despite the disease.  The illness inspires Williams to help others, as evidenced by his endorsement of a variety of health products.

After being diagnosed with multiple sclerosis in 1999, Montel established the Montel Williams Foundation. The foundation has issued grants totaling more than $1.5 million for the study of multiple sclerosis, including one study at the Karolinska Institute in Sweden.

Montel’s full name is Montel Brian Anthony Williams, and he was born in Baltimore, Md.  He enlisted in the Marines in 1974 and later moved to the Navy.  He enrolled at the United States Naval Academy and graduated in 1980 with a degree in engineering. He went on to serve a total of 22 years in the military. 

"His success on television and as an author has made him known to millions of people"
His military career was outstanding, as he enlisted in the Marines in his hometown after high school and then earned two promotions within six months. He became the first African-American selected to the Naval Academy Prep School and later enrolled at the Naval Academy.  In addition to his engineering studies, Montel has studied Russian language and Mandarin Chinese.  In the military he used the foreign language background to become a special duty intelligence officer with a specialization in cryptology.

 

Montel also is an actor. He has appeared on television programs such as “All My Children,” “JAG,” and “American Dreams.” In 2009 he was nominated for a NAACP Image Award for his performances in “Guiding Light.” The NAACP nomination recognized him for “Outstanding Actor in a Television Series.” He also starred in an off-Broadway play, “The Exonerated”.

Many of his fans know him as a bestselling author. He wrote inspirational memoirs “Climbing Higher”, "Living Well; 21days to Transform Your Life, Supercharge Your Health and Feel Spectacular", and “Mountain, Get Out of My Way.” All of which made “The New York Times” bestseller lists. He is the coauthor of another bestseller, “Bodychange.”

His success on television and as an author has made him known to millions of people. His fans believe in him because of his incredible life story, including his distinguished military career and his battle against multiple sclerosis.  His overall life story is one of the key reasons MoneyMutual sought him as an endorser. After agreeing to endorse MoneyMutual Montel said on television, “MoneyMutual’s online lending network is a cash source you can trust for finding a short-term loan quickly and easily.”

He is easily recognizable on television because of his bald head. He started shaving his head in 1982 – nine years before “The Montel Williams Show” maintained its debut. He credits proper eating and fitness as one of the keys to battling multiple sclerosis.  After being diagnosed with the disease he said, “This disease is not going to stop me. We don’t know how long I have had it for, but I have been misdiagnosed for 10 years.”

He lives in New York City and is said to be an avid snowboarder and roller coaster enthusiast in his free time.

', 1, GETDATE(), GETDATE()); DELETE FROM Article WHERE ArticleId = 352406448814078923; INSERT INTO Article ([ArticleId] ,[DateCreated] ,[DateModified] ,[ArticlePageId] ,[Title] ,[MetaDescription] ,[MetaKeywords] ,[HeaderImageAltText] ,[HtmlContentId] ,[ManagementApproved] ,[LegalApproved] ,[Author] ,[Revision] ,[UrlAccessible] ,[LiveAccessible] ,[WebsiteId] ,[PageName] ,[HeaderContent] ,[MainTemplate] ,[MobileTemplate] ,[ModalTemplate] ,[MobileUserExperienceId] ,[SerializedArticleRegions] ) VALUES (352406448814078923 ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,NULL ,'About Montel Williams - Biography - MoneyMutual' ,'Read Montel Williams’ biography and find out why he is the best choice for a spokesperson for Money Mutual based on his lifelong passion to help people deal with their problems.' ,'Montel Williams Money Mutual, Montel Williams Biography, Montel Williams Loans' ,'' ,187530253696362071 ,1 ,1 ,'david.maple' ,1 ,1 ,1 ,5484604087494250496 ,'montel-williams/about' ,'' ,'/templates/Silo.xhtml' ,'/mobile/MobileSilo.xhtml' ,'/templates/ModalArticleTemplate.xhtml' ,3226773266688846570 ,'' ); -- test article DELETE FROM HtmlContent WHERE HtmlContentId = 3415239909746811209; INSERT INTO HtmlContent (HtmlContentId, Name, Text, Active, DateCreated, DateModified) VALUES (3415239909746811209, 'Article Test: 3415239909746811209', '

Montel Williams Biography


Montel Williams is one of the most recognized television personalities in the world after having conducted more than 30,000 interviews. He hosted “The Montel Williams Show,” a syndicated talk show that was distributed for 17 years by CBS Paramount Television.  Williams taped more than 3,500 shows and was known for focusing on problems confronting ordinary people as they coped with financial problems, joblessness, illness and other issues.

Williams, born July 3, 1956, knows first-hand about personal problems.  He has multiple sclerosis, but maintains a hectic work schedule despite the disease.  The illness inspires Williams to help others, as evidenced by his endorsement of a variety of health products.

After being diagnosed with multiple sclerosis in 1999, Montel established the Montel Williams Foundation. The foundation has issued grants totaling more than $1.5 million for the study of multiple sclerosis, including one study at the Karolinska Institute in Sweden.

Montel’s full name is Montel Brian Anthony Williams, and he was born in Baltimore, Md.  He enlisted in the Marines in 1974 and later moved to the Navy.  He enrolled at the United States Naval Academy and graduated in 1980 with a degree in engineering. He went on to serve a total of 22 years in the military. 

"His success on television and as an author has made him known to millions of people"
His military career was outstanding, as he enlisted in the Marines in his hometown after high school and then earned two promotions within six months. He became the first African-American selected to the Naval Academy Prep School and later enrolled at the Naval Academy.  In addition to his engineering studies, Montel has studied Russian language and Mandarin Chinese.  In the military he used the foreign language background to become a special duty intelligence officer with a specialization in cryptology.

 

Montel also is an actor. He has appeared on television programs such as “All My Children,” “JAG,” and “American Dreams.” In 2009 he was nominated for a NAACP Image Award for his performances in “Guiding Light.” The NAACP nomination recognized him for “Outstanding Actor in a Television Series.” He also starred in an off-Broadway play, “The Exonerated”.

Many of his fans know him as a bestselling author. He wrote inspirational memoirs “Climbing Higher”, "Living Well; 21days to Transform Your Life, Supercharge Your Health and Feel Spectacular", and “Mountain, Get Out of My Way.” All of which made “The New York Times” bestseller lists. He is the coauthor of another bestseller, “Bodychange.”

His success on television and as an author has made him known to millions of people. His fans believe in him because of his incredible life story, including his distinguished military career and his battle against multiple sclerosis.  His overall life story is one of the key reasons MoneyMutual sought him as an endorser. After agreeing to endorse MoneyMutual Montel said on television, “MoneyMutual’s online lending network is a cash source you can trust for finding a short-term loan quickly and easily.”

He is easily recognizable on television because of his bald head. He started shaving his head in 1982 – nine years before “The Montel Williams Show” maintained its debut. He credits proper eating and fitness as one of the keys to battling multiple sclerosis.  After being diagnosed with the disease he said, “This disease is not going to stop me. We don’t know how long I have had it for, but I have been misdiagnosed for 10 years.”

He lives in New York City and is said to be an avid snowboarder and roller coaster enthusiast in his free time.

    • How To Qualify
  • Cash Advance
  • Bad Credit Loans
  • Montel Williams
 

How To Qualify for a Payday Loan?

Many people who have had the economy hit them hard have found it difficult to get cash when an emergency like a medical crisis or unexpected car repair comes up. They need cash quickly, and going online is one of the more popular options for people in financial emergencies. When your bank or credit union has told you "no" when you''ve applied for a loan, know that you aren''t the only one who''s been turned away. Money Mutual was formed to help people like you connect with a large network of lenders to help you get emergency cash, fast.

Because they were turned down by their financial institutions, many people aren''t sure if they could get a loan at all. Lender requirements vary, and every person''s situation is different, but some of the minimum requirements that lenders in the Money Mutual network require include:

  • Proof of regular income: Regular income can come from a job – meaning you must provide a pay stub. It can also come from benefits from disability or retirement checks – meaning you must provide proof you receive the benefits.
  • At least $800 in monthly income: It''s possible to qualify if you make more, but you must make at least $800 a month.
  • Be 18 and a U.S. resident: Participating lenders in the Money Mutual network only lend to residents of the United States that are 18 years or older.
  • A valid checking account: The majority of the lenders in Money Mutual''s lender network will require you to have a checking account so they can make a direct deposit as well as withdraw repayment.

Be aware that other requirements may apply.

"going online is one of the more popular options for people in financial emergencies"
After you visit the site, fill out the required information, and click to submit, Money Mutual will try and match you with a participating lender in one of the largest lender networks in the U.S. If we''re able to match you with a lender, you''ll then be sent to the lender''s website where you may be asked for more information in order to apply for a loan. At the lender''s site, you may be asked for information like your email address, home address, and other required information.

The lender will make a decision on your loan, and if you''re approved, will email you their contact information as well as a loan offer that includes all the terms and conditions inside. Among the details in the offer will include due dates, fees, finance charges and more. Carefully read over this document before you make any decisions. You have the choice to decline the offer if you don''t agree to the terms. If you accept, the funds could be directly deposited in as little as 24 hours of acceptance.

One of the ways you can borrow responsibly is by making sure you can budget accordingly to be sure that the money will be in your account when the payday loan becomes due to be repaid – that way you''ll avoid further charges on your accounts. If you think you won''t be able to repay on time, contact the lender as soon as possible with the contact information they emailed you.

There are many questions surrounding how to qualify for a payday loan. If you need emergency cash quickly, safely, and securely, Money Mutual may be able to match you to the right lender for your needs.

  • Proof of regular income: Regular income can come from a job – meaning you must provide a pay stub. It can also come from benefits from disability or retirement checks – meaning you must provide proof you receive the benefits.
  • At least $800 in monthly income: It''s possible to qualify if you make more, but you must make at least $800 a month.
  • Be 18 and a U.S. resident: Participating lenders in the Money Mutual network only lend to residents of the United States that are 18 years or older.

  • Cash Advance
  • Bad Credit Loans
  • Montel Williams
 

How to Get Payday Loans Online


Trust is a major part of looking for payday loans online. There are numerous websites from various lenders, offering various levels of service, including professional-looking scam sites. All of the different sites on the web can make it frustrating for someone looking for a lender who is trustworthy. Money Mutual was created for borrowers looking for a one-stop shop for lenders who offer payday loans online. Endorsed by Montel Williams, we connect qualified borrowers to our large network of participating payday loan lenders for free.

MoneyMutual is not a lender and cannot conduct the actions of lenders – but we partner with lenders who understand that professional customer service and abiding by the law are essential in gaining trust. Using our lender-matching service is free, and if you are matched with a participating lender in our network, you could have money deposited into your bank account in as little as 24 hours.

The process of providing your information at the Money Mutual website takes mere minutes, and if you are matched with a lender in the network, you''ll be forwarded on to the lender''s website, where you can begin to apply for a loan offer. There, you''ll likely be asked for basic information such as your name, email address, and street address, among other information.

The lender will then send you a loan offer by email. The email will also include their contact information in case you have any questions. Make sure that you keep this email for your records.

"professional customer service and abiding by the law are essential in gaining trust"
It is very important that you take your time to read over the terms and conditions of your loan offer carefully before you decide to accept. Some of the details in the loan offer will include the total amount you must repay, any fees or finance charges, the interest rate, and more.

You might be in a rush to get your cash, and may feel like you want to accept immediately, but you do have a choice. Remember, if you sign the offer, you must abide by the offer''s terms. If you do not understand the terms, or have any questions about the offer, please contact the lender, and they will be glad to help. Asking the lender how a payday loan online works is normal. Making sure you have a good grasp of your budget before you accept will help to avoid last-minute scrambling for repayment as the due date comes up.

Also paying the loan back on the due date can help you avoid further charges. Most lenders will take the repayment funds directly out of your bank account, so make sure that your budget is ready. You should contact the lender as soon as possible if you think you won''t be able to repay the loan on the due date.

Repaying the loan on the due date will help you avoid additional charges. Most lenders will take the payment directly from your checking account, so make sure that you have budgeted accordingly. If you think you may not be able to pay on the due date, contact your lender as soon as possible.

When you''re researching payday loans online, you may feel overwhelmed with the amount of lender websites out there. If you''re looking to be matched with the right kind of lender, Money Mutual can help match you with a participating lender when you''re looking for short-term cash.

The process of providing your information at the Money Mutual website takes mere minutes, and if you are matched with a lender in the network, you''ll be forwarded on to the lender''s website, where you can begin to apply for a loan offer. There, you''ll likely be asked for basic information such as your name, email address, and street address, among other information.

If you do not understand the terms, or have any questions about the offer, please contact the lender, and they will be glad to help. Asking the lender how a payday loan online works is normal. Making sure you have a good grasp of your budget before you accept will help to avoid last-minute scrambling for repayment as the due date comes up.

Also paying the loan back on the due date can help you avoid further charges. Most lenders will take the repayment funds directly out of your bank account, so make sure that your budget is ready. You should contact the lender as soon as possible if you think you won''t be able to repay the loan on the due date.

Repaying the loan on the due date will help you avoid additional charges. Most lenders will take the payment directly from your checking account, so make sure that you have budgeted accordingly. If you think you may not be able to pay on the due date, contact your lender as soon as possible.

When you''re researching payday loans online, you may feel overwhelmed with the amount of lender websites out there. If you''re looking to be matched with the right kind of lender, Money Mutual can help match you with a participating lender when you''re looking for short-term cash.

Apply For a Loan 100% Online

Do you have a bill that''s overdue? Perhaps you have a loved one with a medical emergency that needs to be taken care of ASAP, and payday is too far away? With Money Mutual, you can get matched with a lender 100% online through your home computer, laptop or mobile device.

How does it work? It''s easy! It only takes a few moments to give all the relevant information, and if we''re able to match you with a lender from our dedicated network, you could be approved within minutes. If you''re matched with a lender and you''re approved, you could get up to $1000* in as little as 24 hours. We help you get matched with a lender quickly, safely, and securely from any Internet-enabled device.

And the best part? You don''t have to stand in line! We help match you with a lender from the privacy of your own laptop, desktop computer, or mobile device so you don''t have to waste time waiting in line. Getting matched with a lender is only mere clicks or finger presses away!

The Internet has made it easier than ever to get the cash you need for any emergency. At Money Mutual, we can help connect you with one of the largest lending networks in the U.S., helping match you with lenders who can help you get the quick cash you need, when payday is too far away.

Apply For a Loan 100% Online

Do you have a bill that''s overdue? Perhaps you have a loved one with a medical emergency that needs to be taken care of ASAP, and payday is too far away? With Money Mutual, you can get matched with a lender 100% online through your home computer, laptop or mobile device.

How does it work? It''s easy! It only takes a few moments to give all the relevant information, and if we''re able to match you with a lender from our dedicated network, you could be approved within minutes. If you''re matched with a lender and you''re approved, you could get up to $1000* in as little as 24 hours. We help you get matched with a lender quickly, safely, and securely from any Internet-enabled device.

And the best part? You don''t have to stand in line! We help match you with a lender from the privacy of your own laptop, desktop computer, or mobile device so you don''t have to waste time waiting in line. Getting matched with a lender is only mere clicks or finger presses away!

  • Bad Credit Loans
  • Montel Williams
 

Can I get a Cash Advance with Not-Perfect Credit?

These days, the state of the economy has affected so many people through no fault of their own. They may find themselves needing emergency cash and are turned away from their bank or credit union. Because of this, they may have found themselves in a situation where their bad credit was the reason they couldn''t get a loan. It''s possible they might think that their less-than-perfect credit means they''ve run out of options. But that might not be the case! Our lenders specialize in offering bad credit cash advances to individuals in need.

Because the economy has affected their credit so negatively, many people probably think that they can''t get money in an emergency. At Money Mutual, we connect potential borrowers with a large network of lenders who have worked with many people in bad credit situations. They understand and may be able to help.

If you are 18 years or older, have a job (or steady income like a retirement or Social Security check), make at least $800 a month, and have a bank account (checking or savings), you may be able to qualify for a payday loan. Other requirements may be needed, and vary from lender to lender.

The process for getting matched with a lender is easy and sometimes fast – having not-perfect credit is ok. When you submit your information, you will get the results of being matched in real-time. If you are matched with a lender, you''ll immediately be taken to the lender''s website, where you''ll be able to review the terms and conditions of your loan offer.

"The process for getting matched with a lender is easy and sometimes fast – having not-perfect credit is ok"
It is vital that you take your time in looking over the terms of your loan offer. It will include details of the loan including fees, finance charges, interest rates, and other details. It''s up to you whether you choose to accept the loan or not. If you do not agree to the terms, you don''t have to accept the loan offer. If you do have questions about the loan, make sure you contact the lender directly with the contact information they send you. If you do accept the loan offer, there''s a possibility you could have the money directly deposited into your checking or savings account in as little as 24 hours.

If you''ve had an unexpected emergency like a car repair or medical bill, then you may feel like bad credit will hurt you. Getting matched with a lender at Money Mutual may be a viable alternative in these kinds of situations. A cash advance that is paid back on time means you are borrowing responsibly – and you could be avoiding further charges on your accounts. If your bank has turned you down for a loan, there are lenders in our network who may be able to help.

If the economy has made a dent in your credit, you aren''t the only one. Money Mutual can connect you with one of the largest lending networks in the country, with lenders who are experienced in working with people who don''t have perfect credit. They may be able to help you get the cash you need – quickly, safely, and securely – in as little as 24 hours.

Money Mutual > Payday Loans > Types of Payday Loans
  • Payday Loans
    • Same Day Payday Loans
    • Instant Payday Loans
    • Payday Loans Online
    • How Short Term Loans Work
    • How Payday Loans Work
    • What are Faxless Payday Loans
    • Types of Payday Loans
    • Legitimate Lenders Online
    • Online Advantages
    • Fast Payday Loans Online
    • How To Qualify
  • Cash Advance
  • Bad Credit Loans
  • Montel Williams
 

Types of Payday Loans

The term "payday loan" sounds like it refers only to one specific type of loan, but in reality, it''s an umbrella term for different kinds of loans. The terms of these loans may be similar, but lenders recently have started offering a variety of loans that are aimed at different types of customers. What kinds of payday loans are out there? Take a look:

  • Military: Loans for those people serving in the military are now available. For people serving in the armed forces that face unexpected financial challenges or have special needs, there are lenders who offer loans for women and men who serve their country. When providing all the required information to the lender, if you are in the military, you should let them know so that they can take it into consideration.
  • Online: For people who prefer the privacy and convenience of the Internet, they can now go online to get emergency funds. Money Mutual helps to connect people to a large network of participating lenders for free online. While not a lender or a loan broker, Money Mutual has partnered with a variety of lenders to help people find cash quickly. If you apply at Money Mutual and are matched with a lender, up to $1,000 could be deposited in as little as 24 hours.
  • No Fax: No fax – or faxless payday loans mean that you could provide all the required information on the web without having to deal with the complications and cost of faxing paperwork or filling out an extended application by hand, helping to make the process quicker and more private.
  • No Credit Check: Many people''s credit scores have been ruined by the economy over the past few years, and that''s where no credit check payday loans come in. Because they have been turned down by their credit union or bank, they need options when an emergency happens. Many lenders who offer this kind of loan understand that bad credit is not the borrower''s fault.
  • "24 Hour Payday Loans": Most lenders that advertise 24-hour payday loans are marketing loans that could be deposited into a borrower''s bank account as quickly as 24 hours after an approved offer. For the most part, these loans are available on the web, meaning that if a person has all the requirements at the time of application – including proof of regular income, bank account information, and more – the process can be fast.

"lenders recently have started offering a variety of loans"
People who are looking for a payday loan should always be aware of offers that seem too good to be true. Many scam artists have appeared online offering "1-hour payday loans," leading people into thinking they could get a payday loan in one hour. In reality borrowers cannot get a loan in 1 hour. But, going online can be a fast process. When people use Money Mutual''s free lender-matching service, the process of providing information and getting matched with a participating lender can take just minutes. If you''re approved and accept a loan offer, money could be deposited into your bank account in as quickly as 24 hours – similar to depositing your paycheck at the bank.

As you can see, there are many different types of payday loans out there. The key with any payday loan online is to understand all of the terms and conditions of the loan before you accept an offer. All payday loan lenders, regardless of the type of loan, are required by law to tell you all the terms of the loan, including how much you will pay in finance charges and fees. Take the time to read over them carefully before you accept. Remember: always borrow responsibly.

', 1, GETDATE(), GETDATE()); DELETE FROM Article WHERE ArticleId = 1474569093260132439; INSERT INTO Article ([ArticleId] ,[DateCreated] ,[DateModified] ,[ArticlePageId] ,[Title] ,[MetaDescription] ,[MetaKeywords] ,[HeaderImageAltText] ,[HtmlContentId] ,[ManagementApproved] ,[LegalApproved] ,[Author] ,[Revision] ,[UrlAccessible] ,[LiveAccessible] ,[WebsiteId] ,[PageName] ,[HeaderContent] ,[MainTemplate] ,[MobileTemplate] ,[ModalTemplate] ,[MobileUserExperienceId] ,[SerializedArticleRegions] ) VALUES (1474569093260132439 ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,NULL ,'The Different Types of Payday Loans | Money Mutual' ,'Want to know what kind of payday loan options are out there? Learn more about different types of payday loans online from Money Mutual.' ,'Types of Payday Cash Loans, No Fax Payday Loans Online, No Credit Check Payday Loans, Types of Payday Loans, No Fax Payday Loans, 24 Hour Payday Loans, Payday Loans Online, Online Payday Loans, Military Payday Loans, Payday loan, Money Mutual' ,'' ,1310743976617533251 ,1 ,1 ,'david.maple' ,1 ,1 ,1 ,5484604087494250496 ,'payday-loans/different-types' ,'' ,'/templates/Silo.xhtml' ,'/mobile/MobileSilo.xhtml' ,'/templates/ModalArticleTemplate.xhtml' ,3226773266688846570 ,'' ); -- test article DELETE FROM HtmlContent WHERE HtmlContentId = 2138123641449307460; INSERT INTO HtmlContent (HtmlContentId, Name, Text, Active, DateCreated, DateModified) VALUES (2138123641449307460, 'Article Test: 2138123641449307460', '

Types of Payday Loans

  • Online: For people who prefer the privacy and convenience of the Internet, they can now go online to get emergency funds. Money Mutual helps to connect people to a large network of participating lenders for free online. While not a lender or a loan broker, Money Mutual has partnered with a variety of lenders to help people find cash quickly. If you apply at Money Mutual and are matched with a lender, up to $1,000 could be deposited in as little as 24 hours.
  • No Fax: No fax – or faxless payday loans mean that you could provide all the required information on the web without having to deal with the complications and cost of faxing paperwork or filling out an extended application by hand, helping to make the process quicker and more private.
  • No Credit Check: Many people''s credit scores have been ruined by the economy over the past few years, and that''s where no credit check payday loans come in. Because they have been turned down by their credit union or bank, they need options when an emergency happens. Many lenders who offer this kind of loan understand that bad credit is not the borrower''s fault.
  • "24 Hour Payday Loans": Most lenders that advertise 24-hour payday loans are marketing loans that could be deposited into a borrower''s bank account as quickly as 24 hours after an approved offer. For the most part, these loans are available on the web, meaning that if a person has all the requirements at the time of application – including proof of regular income, bank account information, and more – the process can be fast.

"lenders recently have started offering a variety of loans"
People who are looking for a payday loan should always be aware of offers that seem too good to be true. Many scam artists have appeared online offering "1-hour payday loans," leading people into thinking they could get a payday loan in one hour. In reality borrowers cannot get a loan in 1 hour. But, going online can be a fast process. When people use Money Mutual''s free lender-matching service, the process of providing information and getting matched with a participating lender can take just minutes. If you''re approved and accept a loan offer, money could be deposited into your bank account in as quickly as 24 hours – similar to depositing your paycheck at the bank.

As you can see, there are many different types of payday loans out there. The key with any payday loan online is to understand all of the terms and conditions of the loan before you accept an offer. All payday loan lenders, regardless of the type of loan, are required by law to tell you all the terms of the loan, including how much you will pay in finance charges and fees. Take the time to read over them carefully before you accept. Remember: always borrow responsibly.

Did you know?

Lawmakers are taking away your access to short-term credit. Join 200,000+ like you and let your voice be heard!

THE FACTS

  • Lawmakers are currently working to take away your access to short-term loan options.
  • Consumers like you should have the right to obtain short-terms loans for emergencies or unexpected events.
  • The Consumer Rights Coalition along with MoneyMutual are dedicated to preserving your access to credit.

TAKE ACTION!

  • Click the Button to go to the CRC website
  • Join the CRC for FREE
  • Contact Lawmakers easily through the CRC and be heard now

Money Mutual > Payday Loans > Instant Payday Loans
  • Payday Loans
    • Same Day Payday Loans
    • Instant Payday Loans
    • Payday Loans Online
    • How Short Term Loans Work
    • How Payday Loans Work
    • What are Faxless Payday Loans
    • Types of Payday Loans
    • Legitimate Lenders Online
    • Online Advantages
    • Fast Payday Loans Online
    • How To Qualify
  • Cash Advance
  • Bad Credit Loans
  • Montel Williams
 

Instant Payday Loan


Emergencies that pop up out of nowhere happen all the time in life. For many people across the country, hard times because of the economy have put their personal credit in trouble, meaning they may be hesitant to look for an instant payday loan online. In fact, going online for a loan is easier and quicker than ever. Whether you had a bill that was a little too high this month, maybe need to make an emergency car repair, or any other kind of unforeseen circumstance, you may be able to get a loan online.

Looking for a loan online, you may end up seeing many offers for "instant payday loans" that may make you think that applying for a loan online means that money will be deposited as soon as you accept an offer from a lender. In reality, that''s not quite how the process works. Look at the process more like going to the bank to deposit a check: often the bank holds the funds for 24 hours to make sure they clear, and then the funds are released to your bank account. MoneyMutual has made the process for getting a loan fast and easy. The matching process only takes moments, and if you get matched with a participating lender, the funds for your emergency could be deposited in as little as 24 hours, depending on the lender you get matched with.

Those who have bad credit during these hard times may find that instant approval payday loans could end up being their choice when emergencies happen. For many people who have bad credit because the economy, many banks and credit unions will put strict guidelines on the money they lend, meaning those who apply there are likely to not get the amount they need – or may even be turned down entirely through no fault of their own. Bad credit can be repaired, but even for those who are in the process of recovering from a bad credit situation, that won''t necessarily guarantee the ability to get a loan from a bank or credit union.

"MoneyMutual has made the process for getting a loan fast and easy"
At MoneyMutual.com, lenders that offer instant payday loans will ask for evidence that you have regular income as well as have a checking account. You could also qualify if you have a regular income that doesn''t necessarily come from a steady job – like a retirement check, for example – though other qualifications may apply.

Payday loans, like other types of credit, must be used responsibly. Just like you, millions of people all over the country have turned to Money Mutual when they needed help for emergency cash. In fact, many of them have found that taking out a payday loan and paying it back on time can be more cost-affordable than paying the fees on bad checks.

Typically, payday loans should be repaid in full when your next payday comes up, unless you have agreed with your lender to other arrangements. Prompt repayment of your loan can sometimes mean lower finance charges.

Having an unexpected difficulty these days can be stressful, especially if the economy has turned your credit upside down. When you need cash quickly, getting an instant cash payday loan may just be the option you need when an emergency happens unexpectedly. Don''t let the lure of "instant payday loans" get you in trouble. MoneyMutual will try to connect you with a participating lender from its network of lenders for free.
