Instant Payday Loan


Emergencies that pop up out of nowhere happen all the time in life. For many people across the country, hard times because of the economy have put their personal credit in trouble, meaning they may be hesitant to look for an instant payday loan online. In fact, going online for a loan is easier and quicker than ever. Whether you had a bill that was a little too high this month, maybe need to make an emergency car repair, or any other kind of unforeseen circumstance, you may be able to get a loan online.

Looking for a loan online, you may end up seeing many offers for "instant payday loans" that may make you think that applying for a loan online means that money will be deposited as soon as you accept an offer from a lender. In reality, that''s not quite how the process works. Look at the process more like going to the bank to deposit a check: often the bank holds the funds for 24 hours to make sure they clear, and then the funds are released to your bank account. MoneyMutual has made the process for getting a loan fast and easy. The matching process only takes moments, and if you get matched with a participating lender, the funds for your emergency could be deposited in as little as 24 hours, depending on the lender you get matched with.

Those who have bad credit during these hard times may find that instant approval payday loans could end up being their choice when emergencies happen. For many people who have bad credit because the economy, many banks and credit unions will put strict guidelines on the money they lend, meaning those who apply there are likely to not get the amount they need – or may even be turned down entirely through no fault of their own. Bad credit can be repaired, but even for those who are in the process of recovering from a bad credit situation, that won''t necessarily guarantee the ability to get a loan from a bank or credit union.

"MoneyMutual has made the process for getting a loan fast and easy"
At MoneyMutual.com, lenders that offer instant payday loans will ask for evidence that you have regular income as well as have a checking account. You could also qualify if you have a regular income that doesn''t necessarily come from a steady job – like a retirement check, for example – though other qualifications may apply.

Payday loans, like other types of credit, must be used responsibly. Just like you, millions of people all over the country have turned to Money Mutual when they needed help for emergency cash. In fact, many of them have found that taking out a payday loan and paying it back on time can be more cost-affordable than paying the fees on bad checks.

Typically, payday loans should be repaid in full when your next payday comes up, unless you have agreed with your lender to other arrangements. Prompt repayment of your loan can sometimes mean lower finance charges.

Having an unexpected difficulty these days can be stressful, especially if the economy has turned your credit upside down. When you need cash quickly, getting an instant cash payday loan may just be the option you need when an emergency happens unexpectedly. Don''t let the lure of "instant payday loans" get you in trouble. MoneyMutual will try to connect you with a participating lender from its network of lenders for free.

Consumer Advisory

Deceptive Ads and Sites Discovered!

Be aware that organizations are creating fake ads and sites to lure consumers to "look-a-like" MoneyMutual web sites. They may include fake security icons and look like legitimate short-term loans sites. These sites may deceptively be collecting your personal information. Victims have been receiving harassing phone calls or emails demanding money, and may even see funds illegally withdrawn from their bank accounts.

NEWS UPDATE: The Federal Trade Commission (FTC) recently filed a complaint against a fake debt collector making harassing phone calls for "phantom payday loan debts". To read more:
http://www.ftc.gov/opa/2012/02/acc.shtm

The security of your information is important to MoneyMutual which is a proud member of the Online Lenders Alliance (www.onlinelendersalliance.org). OLA is proud to announce the launch of the OLA Consumer Hotline at 1-866-299-7585. The Consumer Hotline is a resource for online customers to speak to live operators to answer questions about online short-term lending and report fraudulent phone calls.

What You Need to Know:
MoneyMutual works closely with search engines to identify and eliminate counterfeit ads and web sites. However, always make sure you are on the right site before entering your information. Avoid becoming a victim of fraud by going to the official MoneyMutual web site.

Here''s what you need to look for:

  • Montel Williams
  • Registered trademark next to the MoneyMutual logo
  • McAfee''s logo displayed on the homepage with today''s date to ensure site security
  • VeriSign logo that ensures your information is secure
  • OLA (Online Lenders Alliance)

 

If you feel you have been a victim of fraud, please contact your local authorities or click on one of these links below:

http://www.fbi.gov/scams-safety/e-scams
http://www.ic3.gov/media/2010/101201.aspx

If you have more questions, please call the MoneyMutual Customer Support at 800-460-9090

Consumer Advisory

Deceptive Ads and Sites Discovered!

Be aware that organizations are creating fake ads and sites to lure consumers to "look-a-like" MoneyMutual web sites. They may include fake security icons and look like legitimate short-term loans sites. These sites may deceptively be collecting your personal information. Victims have been receiving harassing phone calls or emails demanding money, and may even see funds illegally withdrawn from their bank accounts.

NEWS UPDATE: The Federal Trade Commission (FTC) recently filed a complaint against a fake debt collector making harassing phone calls for "phantom payday loan debts". To read more:
http://www.ftc.gov/opa/2012/02/acc.shtm

The security of your information is important to MoneyMutual which is a proud member of the Online Lenders Alliance (www.onlinelendersalliance.org). OLA is proud to announce the launch of the OLA Consumer Hotline at 1-866-299-7585. The Consumer Hotline is a resource for online customers to speak to live operators to answer questions about online short-term lending and report fraudulent phone calls.

What You Need to Know:
MoneyMutual works closely with search engines to identify and eliminate counterfeit ads and web sites. However, always make sure you are on the right site before entering your information. Avoid becoming a victim of fraud by going to the official MoneyMutual web site.

Here''s what you need to look for:

  • Montel Williams
  • Registered trademark next to the MoneyMutual logo
  • McAfee''s logo displayed on the homepage with today''s date to ensure site security
  • VeriSign logo that ensures your information is secure
  • OLA (Online Lenders Alliance)

 

If you feel you have been a victim of fraud, please contact your local authorities or click on one of these links below:

http://www.fbi.gov/scams-safety/e-scams
http://www.ic3.gov/media/2010/101201.aspx

If you have more questions, please call the MoneyMutual Customer Support at 800-460-9090

Why have over a million people turned to MoneyMutual?

• Approval for up to $1,000 directly deposited as soon as tomorrow*: Once you''ve provided the lender with all your information, the approval process is typically very fast. You could have up to $1,000 directly deposited into your bank account in as little as 24 hours.

• Our easy online form takes less than 5 minutes to complete: With just a few bits of simple information, you could be matched with a lender in minutes.

• Exclusively endorsed by Montel Williams: Celebrated talk show host and Daytime Emmy Award winner Montel Williams allies himself with products that help people live better – physically, spiritually, financially and emotionally. He knows that the economic downturn has left many individuals with upside down credit and difficult-to-pay expenses – and he understands that a cash advance loan can provide quick needed assistance and help avoid more costly fees.

• Verisign 128-Bit encryption for your safety and security: As the trusted name in online encryption, this site uses Verisign''s 128-bit encryption to protect the transmission of your information.

• Proud member of the Online Lenders Alliance: As a trade organization for the online lending industry, the OLA is dedicated to ensuring that customers are fully informed and fairly treated.

• 24/7 customer service: Our goal is to be the leader in providing the best customer service in the industry. If you have any questions, we are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week by phone or email.

How does it work?

MoneyMutual is a lending network, NOT a lender. Our service is completely free and all repayment terms are between you and the lender. Each lender has different loan terms, such as the loan amount, the APR for the loan, repayment schedules, etc.

After submitting your information, if you are matched with a lender, MoneyMutual will redirect to the lender''s web site where you will be able to review loan terms and conditions. In many cases, the lender will then contact you to confirm your personal information and finalize the loan. They may contact you via telephone, email, text messages, etc. Please make sure that you respond in a timely manner to ensure that funds are deposited as quickly as possible.

• Approval for up to $1,000 directly deposited as soon as tomorrow*: Once you''ve provided the lender with all your information, the approval process is typically very fast. You could have up to $1,000 directly deposited into your bank account in as little as 24 hours.

Money Mutual > Payday Loans > Fast Payday Loans Online
  • Payday Loans
    • Same Day Payday Loans
    • Instant Payday Loans
    • Payday Loans Online
    • How Short Term Loans Work
    • How Payday Loans Work
    • What are Faxless Payday Loans
    • Types of Payday Loans
    • Legitimate Lenders Online
    • Online Advantages
    • Fast Payday Loans Online
    • How To Qualify
  • Cash Advance
  • Bad Credit Loans
  • Montel Williams
 

How Fast are Payday Loans Online?

From shopping to banking, the growth of the Internet in the past 10 years has helped many people find more convenience, become more tech savvy and also more productive. Along with all of those benefits, it''s also made doing things much faster. As you may already know, the economy has also had good and bad periods during the past decade, meaning that many people have found themselves in an emergency situation through no fault of their own. With the web, instead of waiting in a long line, people can now get a fast payday loan online.

Money Mutual has created one of the largest lender networks in the country in order to help borrowers like you get the cash you need, quickly, safely, and easily. It only takes minutes to fill out the forms at MoneyMutual.com, and approval is made at the site in real time. If you make $800 or more a month, are 18 years or older, have a valid checking account, it''s possible you could be matched with a lender. Based on individual lender requirements, other conditions may apply.

"instead of waiting in a long line, people can now get a fast payday loan online"
If you meet all the requirements, and then fill out the forms, submitting your information takes one click. We will then attempt to match you with a participating lender in real time, and approval is sometimes instant. If you get matched with a lender, you''ll then be forwarded on to the lender''s website where you may be asked to fill out additional forms with basic information such as your home address, email, phone number, or other information.

If you''re approved, you''ll then be given a loan offer – many times sent to your email inbox – where you can review all the terms and conditions. Some of the details in the offer will include any fees, finance charges, due dates, and more. Take your time in looking over these to make sure you like the offer. You should contact the lender directly if you have any questions. If you do not like the offer, you have a choice to say no if you don''t agree.

Upon acceptance of the loan offer (if you do so), the lender who sent you the offer will directly deposit the money into your checking account as soon as 24 hours after you accept. Just like depositing a check at the bank, the funds need at least 24 hours to clear before they appear in your account.

Making sure you can pay the loan back on time is important if you want to avoid further charges. That means you should make sure that you have the money in your account when the due date comes. If you think you may be late on a repayment, you should contact the lender directly.

How Fast are Payday Loans Online?

From shopping to banking, the growth of the Internet in the past 10 years has helped many people find more convenience, become more tech savvy and also more productive. Along with all of those benefits, it''s also made doing things much faster. As you may already know, the economy has also had good and bad periods during the past decade, meaning that many people have found themselves in an emergency situation through no fault of their own. With the web, instead of waiting in a long line, people can now get a fast payday loan online.

Money Mutual has created one of the largest lender networks in the country in order to help borrowers like you get the cash you need, quickly, safely, and easily. It only takes minutes to fill out the forms at MoneyMutual.com, and approval is made at the site in real time. If you make $800 or more a month, are 18 years or older, have a valid checking account, it''s possible you could be matched with a lender. Based on individual lender requirements, other conditions may apply.

"instead of waiting in a long line, people can now get a fast payday loan online"
If you meet all the requirements, and then fill out the forms, submitting your information takes one click. We will then attempt to match you with a participating lender in real time, and approval is sometimes instant. If you get matched with a lender, you''ll then be forwarded on to the lender''s website where you may be asked to fill out additional forms with basic information such as your home address, email, phone number, or other information.

If you''re approved, you''ll then be given a loan offer – many times sent to your email inbox – where you can review all the terms and conditions. Some of the details in the offer will include any fees, finance charges, due dates, and more. Take your time in looking over these to make sure you like the offer. You should contact the lender directly if you have any questions. If you do not like the offer, you have a choice to say no if you don''t agree.

Upon acceptance of the loan offer (if you do so), the lender who sent you the offer will directly deposit the money into your checking account as soon as 24 hours after you accept. Just like depositing a check at the bank, the funds need at least 24 hours to clear before they appear in your account.

Making sure you can pay the loan back on time is important if you want to avoid further charges. That means you should make sure that you have the money in your account when the due date comes. If you think you may be late on a repayment, you should contact the lender directly.

  • Cash Advance

    • Payday Loans With Bad Credit?
    • Bad Credit Loans
    • Unsecured Installment Loans
    • Online Unsecured Installment Loans

    • Emergency Loans

    • Are There Loans If You Have Bad Credit?
  • Montel Williams
 

Bad Credit Loans with No Bank Account


If you''ve found yourself having bad credit as an impact from a shaky economy, getting a loan can seem challenging. With a little research, you might be able to find a lender who could possibly be able to get you the money you need, even if you have bad credit.

Most of the time, lenders offering short term payday loans and other types of bad credit loans require you to have a bank account so that the lender can quickly deposit your money and to facilitate repayment. Many lenders are comfortable approving a bad credit personal loan if you have an active checking account you use for depositing regular earnings from a full-time job, pension, or other regular income and meet the lenders other requirements as well.

"If you''re looking for a lender who can offer you bad credit loans, you may be able to find one online"
You may still be able to get a bad credit loan with no bank account. Some people with extreme credit problems may avoid banks because they fear bank garnishment for other old debts, or they may have jobs that pay them in cash and they would rather not deposit money into a bank. There are also people who avoid banks because they feel monthly fees on checking accounts or overdraft charges are too expensive.

A lender considering you for a bad credit loan with no bank account may require a deeper background check than bad credit lenders offering other types of loans. But when a lender is considering loaning money to you without access to your bank account, they likely will want to know how you have handled your credit in the past.

Lenders considering you for a loan with no bank account may also require personal references – and may actually call the references before deciding on whether or not to approve the loan. Your references could be friends or family members, and the lender may ask them about your character and whether you are likely to repay a loan so keep this in mind before providing any information. Because of this process, the amount of time it takes for approval could be longer than with other loan offers.

If you''re looking for a lender who can offer you bad credit loans, you may be able to find one online. Here at MoneyMutual.com, we may be able to match you with a participating lender who specializes in bad credit personal loans. While MoneyMutual is not a broker or lender and does not loan money, we may be able to match you with a participating lender who might be able help you with the kind of loan you''re looking for. Try to have all the proper paperwork handy when you apply for a bad credit loan online. Depending on the participating lender, they may require that you have a bank account so the lender can directly deposit the funds if you are approved. Make sure you read all of the loan terms carefully before agreeing to the loan. Please remember to always borrow responsibly.

', 1, GETDATE(), GETDATE()); DELETE FROM Article WHERE ArticleId = 1119099698567629390; INSERT INTO Article ([ArticleId] ,[DateCreated] ,[DateModified] ,[ArticlePageId] ,[Title] ,[MetaDescription] ,[MetaKeywords] ,[HeaderImageAltText] ,[HtmlContentId] ,[ManagementApproved] ,[LegalApproved] ,[Author] ,[Revision] ,[UrlAccessible] ,[LiveAccessible] ,[WebsiteId] ,[PageName] ,[HeaderContent] ,[MainTemplate] ,[MobileTemplate] ,[ModalTemplate] ,[MobileUserExperienceId] ,[SerializedArticleRegions] ) VALUES (1119099698567629390 ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,NULL ,'Can You Get Bad Credit Loans with No Bank Account? | Money Mutual' ,'Discover how to get bad credit loans with no back account. Money Mutual explains the loan possibilities, even if you don’t have a bank account and bad credit.' ,'Bad Credit Loans No Bank Account, Bad Credit Personal Loan, Bad Credit Loans, Loans for Bad Credit, No Bank Account, Money Mutual' ,'' ,554780195453324747 ,1 ,1 ,'david.maple' ,1 ,1 ,1 ,5484604087494250496 ,'bad-credit-loans/no-bank-account' ,'' ,'/templates/Silo.xhtml' ,'/mobile/MobileSilo.xhtml' ,'/templates/ModalArticleTemplate.xhtml' ,3226773266688846570 ,'' ); -- test article DELETE FROM HtmlContent WHERE HtmlContentId = 1855853910798881062; INSERT INTO HtmlContent (HtmlContentId, Name, Text, Active, DateCreated, DateModified) VALUES (1855853910798881062, 'Article Test: 1855853910798881062', '

Depending on the participating lender, they may require that you have a bank account so the lender can directly deposit the funds if you are approved. Why have over a million people turned to MoneyMutual?

• Approval for up to $1,000 directly deposited as soon as tomorrow*: Once you''ve provided the lender with all your information, the approval process is typically very fast. You could have up to $1000 directly deposited into your bank account in as little as 24 hours.

Our easy online form takes less than 5 minutes to complete: With just a few bits of simple information, you could be matched with a lender in minutes.

• Exclusively endorsed by Montel Williams: Celebrated talk show host and Daytime Emmy Award winner Montel Williams allies himself with products that help people live better -- physically, spiritually, financially and emotionally. He knows that the economic downturn has left many individuals with upside down credit and difficult-to-pay expenses – and he understands that a cash advance loan can provide quick needed assistance and help avoid more costly fees.

• Verisign 128-Bit encryption for your safety and security: As the trusted name in online encryption, this site uses Verisign''s 128-bit encryption to protect the transmission of your information.

• Your privacy is certified by TRUSTe: TRUSTe is the leading online privacy solutions provider, safeguarding the privacy of consumers on more than 5,000 websites including those from top companies.

• Proud member of the Online Lenders Alliance: As a trade organization for the online lending industry, the OLA is dedicated to ensuring that customers are fully informed and fairly treated.

• 24/7 customer service: Our goal is to be the leader in providing the best customer service in the industry. If you have any questions, we are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week by phone or email.

How does it work?

MoneyMutual is a lending network, NOT a lender. Our service is completely free and all repayment terms are between you and the lender. Each lender has different loan terms, such as the loan amount, the APR for the loan, repayment schedules, etc.

After submitting your information, if you are matched with a lender, MoneyMutual will redirect to the lender''s web site where you will be able to review loan terms and conditions. In many cases, the lender will then contact you to confirm your personal information and finalize the loan. They may contact you via telephone, email, text messages, etc. Please make sure that you respond in a timely manner to ensure that funds are deposited as quickly as possible.

How to Get a Loan with Bad Credit


Today''s economy has devastated many families and individuals, leaving them in need of a loan when they have bad credit. Many people are under the impression that bad credit can mean they won''t be able to get a loan for any emergency situation. Fortunately, those who have bad credit due to the poor economy do have options when in need of an emergency loan:
 

  • Installment loans
  • Emergency cash advance loan
  • Short term payday loans

You aren''t the only one out there who needs help. MoneyMutual may be able to match you with a lender who understands your bad credit situation and may be willing to quickly get you the money that you need pending approval.

Whether you need an emergency short-term loan to help a relative who is in crisis, or even need a short term payday loan to help pay your rent, you are not alone in needing help! There are lenders who specialize in working with people who need a loan, even if they have bad credit. That’s where we come in. We help match you with the right lender, based on the information you provide, to get you the loan you need.

What kind of information might you need to provide? In many instances, working consistently at a job or having some other source of regular income is the important requirement you need to qualify for certain kinds of loans (like bad credit payday loans). Many lenders expect you to meet certain basic requirements before you''re approved for a loan.
 

"There are lenders who specialize in working with people who need a loan, even if they have bad credit"
When looking for the right loan for you, make sure to take your time. If you have questions at any point during the process, don''t hesitate to ask. Take the time to clearly understand all the terms of your loan before agreeing to it – it will include the total cost of the loan, the interest rate, and repayment obligations and options. Before you accept a loan with a matched lender, consider your ability to repay the loan based on the terms of the loan given to you.

If the economy has left you with bad credit, and you need an emergency loan, there are options to get you the money you need. We will help match you with the right kind of lender, even if you have bad credit. Careful research and review of the loan''s terms and conditions will help you choose your best option for any emergency situation.

 

 

', 1, GETDATE(), GETDATE()); DELETE FROM Article WHERE ArticleId = 1230409408739848172; INSERT INTO Article ([ArticleId] ,[DateCreated] ,[DateModified] ,[ArticlePageId] ,[Title] ,[MetaDescription] ,[MetaKeywords] ,[HeaderImageAltText] ,[HtmlContentId] ,[ManagementApproved] ,[LegalApproved] ,[Author] ,[Revision] ,[UrlAccessible] ,[LiveAccessible] ,[WebsiteId] ,[PageName] ,[HeaderContent] ,[MainTemplate] ,[MobileTemplate] ,[ModalTemplate] ,[MobileUserExperienceId] ,[SerializedArticleRegions] ) VALUES (1230409408739848172 ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,NULL ,'How to Get a Loan with Bad Credit | MoneyMutual' ,'Money Mutual can set up personal loans with bad credit using lender matching services. How to Get a Loan with Bad Credit

We will help match you with the right kind of lender, even if you have bad credit. Careful research and review of the loan''s terms and conditions will help you choose your best option for any emergency situation.

 

 

', 1, GETDATE(), GETDATE()); DELETE FROM Article WHERE ArticleId = 923347016784177986; INSERT INTO Article ([ArticleId] ,[DateCreated] ,[DateModified] ,[ArticlePageId] ,[Title] ,[MetaDescription] ,[MetaKeywords] ,[HeaderImageAltText] ,[HtmlContentId] ,[ManagementApproved] ,[LegalApproved] ,[Author] ,[Revision] ,[UrlAccessible] ,[LiveAccessible] ,[WebsiteId] ,[PageName] ,[HeaderContent] ,[MainTemplate] ,[MobileTemplate] ,[ModalTemplate] ,[MobileUserExperienceId] ,[SerializedArticleRegions] ) VALUES (923347016784177986 ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,NULL ,'How to Get a Loan with Bad Credit | MoneyMutual' ,'Money Mutual can set up personal loans with bad credit using lender matching services. Get an emergency personal loan today, even if you have bad credit.' ,'Loans with Bad Credit, Bad Credit Loans, Personal Loans, Bad Credit, Money Mutual' ,'' ,4339284550062884475 ,1 ,1 ,'david.maple' ,1 ,1 ,1 ,5484604087494250496 ,'bad-credit-loans/how-to-get' ,'' ,'/templates/Silo.xhtml' ,'/mobile/MobileSilo.xhtml' ,'/templates/ModalArticleTemplate.xhtml' ,3226773266688846570 ,'' ); -- article page DELETE FROM ArticlePage WHERE ArticlePageId = 1546346839638117180; INSERT INTO ArticlePage ([ArticlePageId] ,[DateCreated] ,[WebsiteId] ,[PageName] ,[Active] ,[LiveArticleId] ,[TestArticleId] ,[UrlAccessible] ,[LiveAccessible] ,[Locale]) VALUES (1546346839638117180 ,GETDATE() ,5484604087494250496 ,'bad-credit-loans/how-to-get' ,1 ,1230409408739848172 ,923347016784177986 ,1 ,1 ,'en'); /* =========================================================== */ /* MoneyMutual.com/bad-credit-loans/guaranteed.html */ /* =========================================================== */ -- live article DELETE FROM HtmlContent WHERE HtmlContentId = 3670323752158575506; INSERT INTO HtmlContent (HtmlContentId, Name, Text, Active, DateCreated, DateModified) VALUES (3670323752158575506, 'Article: 3670323752158575506', '
Money Mutual > Bad Credit Loans > Guaranteed Bad Credit Loans
  • Payday Loans
  • Cash Advance
  • Bad Credit Loans
    • Qualify for Payday Loans With Bad Credit
    • Payday Loans With Bad Credit?
    • Bad Credit Loans
    • Unsecured Installment Loans
    • Online Unsecured Installment Loans
    • Loans With Bad Credit
    • Guaranteed Bad Credit Loans
    • How to Get a Cash Advance
    • Can You Get a Short Term Loan?
    • Emergency Loans
    • Types of Bad Credit Loans
    • Are There Loans If You Have Bad Credit?
  • Montel Williams
 

Can I Be Guaranteed a Loan on Bad Credit?


Has the economy ruined your credit? You are not the only one. There are many people out there who think they can''t get a loan due to the economy making their credit go south, but there are some choices out there. An increasing number of lenders are willing to approve people with bad credit for loans, and while some bad credit loans can be easy to qualify for, few lenders are willing to guarantee approval before verifying certain information.

Oftentimes, having bad credit won''t necessarily disqualify you from getting a loan. In many instances, a steady job or other regular income is the key requirement you need to qualify for certain types of loans (such as bad credit payday loans). Many lenders expect you to meet certain minimum requirements before you''re approved for a loan.

Searching for the right kind of lender can seem like a daunting task, but we''re here to make that search easier and simpler. At MoneyMutual.com, we work with a variety of lenders who want to help people with bad credit get cash for a major emergency in their lives. MoneyMutual is not a lender or broker, and will not charge you a fee for matching you with a lender. If we are able to match you with a lender, the lender, not MoneyMutual, will make a determination on the status of your approval.

Like any other kind of lender, bad credit lenders need some assurances that you have the means to repay the loan. As a real world example, a loan from a pawn shop or car title loan agency might qualify as a guaranteed bad credit loan, because you agree to pledge your automobile or something else valuable as collateral. When applying for a loan when you have bad credit, having proof that you have steady income demonstrates that you have the means to pay off the loan, and can be helpful in obtaining a loan.

"Oftentimes, having bad credit won''t necessarily disqualify you from getting a loan"
When shopping around for guaranteed bad credit loans you should seek out reputable lenders. Our goal is to match you with a lender willing to treat you with courtesy and respect, while adhering to all applicable lending laws.  MoneyMutual strongly encourages you to carefully make sure you can repay the loan you are offered before you accept. Always read the terms and conditions of your loan carefully -- and if you have any questions at any point of the process, do not hesitate to ask your lender.

If the economy has ruined your credit, you aren''t alone. Bad credit doesn''t mean that finding a loan is hopeless. At Money Mutual, we''re here to help match you with a lender who may be able to approve you for a loan for any kind of unforeseen circumstances, even if you have bad credit.

', 1, GETDATE(), GETDATE()); DELETE FROM Article WHERE ArticleId = 2160681478781016816; INSERT INTO Article ([ArticleId] ,[DateCreated] ,[DateModified] ,[ArticlePageId] ,[Title] ,[MetaDescription] ,[MetaKeywords] ,[HeaderImageAltText] ,[HtmlContentId] ,[ManagementApproved] ,[LegalApproved] ,[Author] ,[Revision] ,[UrlAccessible] ,[LiveAccessible] ,[WebsiteId] ,[PageName] ,[HeaderContent] ,[MainTemplate] ,[MobileTemplate] ,[ModalTemplate] ,[MobileUserExperienceId] ,[SerializedArticleRegions] ) VALUES (2160681478781016816 ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,NULL ,'Can I Be Guaranteed a Loan on Bad Credit? | MoneyMutual' ,'Guaranteed bad credit loans are available online at Money Mutual. Get approved today for a guaranteed personal loan, even if you have bad credit.' ,'Guaranteed Bad Credit Loans, Bad Credit Loans, Guaranteed Personal Loan, Personal Loan, Money Mutual, MoneyMutual' ,'' ,3670323752158575506 ,1 ,1 ,'david.maple' ,1 ,1 ,1 ,5484604087494250496 ,'bad-credit-loans/guaranteed' ,'' ,'/templates/Silo.xhtml' ,'/mobile/MobileSilo.xhtml' ,'/templates/ModalArticleTemplate.xhtml' ,3226773266688846570 ,'' ); -- test article DELETE FROM HtmlContent WHERE HtmlContentId = 4090499971398900916; INSERT INTO HtmlContent (HtmlContentId, Name, Text, Active, DateCreated, DateModified) VALUES (4090499971398900916, 'Article Test: 4090499971398900916', '

Can I Be Guaranteed a Loan on Bad Credit?


Has the economy ruined your credit? You are not the only one. There are many people out there who think they can''t get a loan due to the economy making their credit go south, but there are some choices out there. An increasing number of lenders are willing to approve people with bad credit for loans, and while some bad credit loans can be easy to qualify for, few lenders are willing to guarantee approval before verifying certain information.

Oftentimes, having bad credit won''t necessarily disqualify you from getting a loan. In many instances, a steady job or other regular income is the key requirement you need to qualify for certain types of loans (such as bad credit payday loans). Many lenders expect you to meet certain minimum requirements before you''re approved for a loan.

Searching for the right kind of lender can seem like a daunting task, but we''re here to make that search easier and simpler. At MoneyMutual.com, we work with a variety of lenders who want to help people with bad credit get cash for a major emergency in their lives. MoneyMutual is not a lender or broker, and will not charge you a fee for matching you with a lender. If we are able to match you with a lender, the lender, not MoneyMutual, will make a determination on the status of your approval.

Like any other kind of lender, bad credit lenders need some assurances that you have the means to repay the loan. As a real world example, a loan from a pawn shop or car title loan agency might qualify as a guaranteed bad credit loan, because you agree to pledge your automobile or something else valuable as collateral. When applying for a loan when you have bad credit, having proof that you have steady income demonstrates that you have the means to pay off the loan, and can be helpful in obtaining a loan.

"Oftentimes, having bad credit won''t necessarily disqualify you from getting a loan"
When shopping around for guaranteed bad credit loans you should seek out reputable lenders. Our goal is to match you with a lender willing to treat you with courtesy and respect, while adhering to all applicable lending laws.  MoneyMutual strongly encourages you to carefully make sure you can repay the loan you are offered before you accept. Always read the terms and conditions of your loan carefully -- and if you have any questions at any point of the process, do not hesitate to ask your lender.

If the economy has ruined your credit, you aren''t alone. Bad credit doesn''t mean that finding a loan is hopeless. At Money Mutual, we''re here to help match you with a lender who may be able to approve you for a loan for any kind of unforeseen circumstances, even if you have bad credit.

', 1, GETDATE(), GETDATE()); DELETE FROM Article WHERE ArticleId = 2977455708718173077; INSERT INTO Article ([ArticleId] ,[DateCreated] ,[DateModified] ,[ArticlePageId] ,[Title] ,[MetaDescription] ,[MetaKeywords] ,[HeaderImageAltText] ,[HtmlContentId] ,[ManagementApproved] ,[LegalApproved] ,[Author] ,[Revision] ,[UrlAccessible] ,[LiveAccessible] ,[WebsiteId] ,[PageName] ,[HeaderContent] ,[MainTemplate] ,[MobileTemplate] ,[ModalTemplate] ,[MobileUserExperienceId] ,[SerializedArticleRegions] ) VALUES (2977455708718173077 ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,NULL ,'Can I Be Guaranteed a Loan on Bad Credit? | MoneyMutual' ,'Guaranteed bad credit loans are available online at Money Mutual. Money Mutual > Frequently Asked Questions
  • Do lenders offer loans over $1,000?
  • I have a reservation number from an Emergency Cash Card. Where do I enter it?
  • Can I get an installment loan?
  • Do social security, pension, disability, and other kinds of benefits qualify as income?
  • Is this a payday loan? What is a payday loan?
  • Can I specify the length of the loan?
  • Where do I log in?
  • What happens if I''m late on a payment, don''t pay the loan back, or default on the loan?
  • I haven''t received an email response about my loan? What do I do?
  • If MoneyMutual isn''t a lender, why should I use your service?
  • I am self-employed. Can I still get a loan?
  • What do you do with my information? Do you keep my information?
  • What if I don''t have my employer''s phone number or address?
  • Is your site secure?
  • What are the terms and details of my loan?
  • How do I qualify? Is having bad or no credit OK?
  • How soon do I get my money?
  • Why do you need my banking information before I am approved?
  • Why do you need my employer''s phone number? Are you going to contact my employer?
  • Can I pick my payments? When is the first payment due?
  • Can I get a loan if I have a savings account? What if I get paid with a prepaid debit card?
 

Frequently Asked Questions

Do lenders offer loans over $1,000?

Participating lenders in our network only provide short-term loans up to $1,000. If you''re approved and practice responsible borrowing, we encourage you to apply again in the future. When you return to our site, we securely save all your information to make it easier to apply again.

I have a reservation number from an Emergency Cash Card. Where do I enter it?

If you don''t see where to enter the reservation number from your Emergency Cash Card, please click here. If you''ve lost your Card, you can get started on the MoneyMutual.com homepage.

Can I get an installment loan?

Our network includes lenders who specialize in installment loans, though you could have a better chance of being matched with a lender if you apply with our entire lending network on MoneyMutual.com. If you''re interested in getting matched with an installment loan lender, head to our installment loan site to get started.

Do social security, pension, disability, and other kinds of benefits qualify as income?

If you''re collecting Social Security, pension, disability, or other kinds of benefits, you may be eligible. If you receive at least $800 a month as well as meet other lender requirements, you may be able to get a loan. Other conditions may apply and will vary from lender to lender.

Is this a payday loan? What is a payday loan?

Many of the participating lenders in our network offer payday loans. A payday loan is a short-term solution especially designed to get you emergency cash fast - and you are typically required to pay it back on your next payday.

Can I specify the length of the loan?

Typically a short-term loan is for a much shorter duration than 12 months. Each lender is different, so the terms and conditions they offer are also different. If you get a loan offer, it''ll include all the details of your loan, including dates for repayment. You have a choice in whether or not you agree to the terms of the offer. If you don''t agree with the terms of the loan offer, you do not have to accept the loan. And you''re always more than welcome to come back and re-apply. If you''re looking to get an installment loan, please click here to find out more and get started.

Where do I log in?

Welcome back! All you need is your first name, last name, and email address to proceed – you don''t need a password. You can click here to log in.

What happens if I''m late on a payment, don''t pay the loan back, or default on the loan?

If you only pay part of the loan, have a late payment, or don''t pay it back, you could end up paying additional fees and face collections. If you think that you may miss a payment, you should immediately contact the lender directly using the contact information they''ve provided. Please remember to use short term loans responsibly and accept the loan offer only if you''re confident in your ability to repay based on the lender''s terms. If you think you may miss a payment, please contact the lender with the contact information they sent you with your loan offer. Learn more about late or missed payments on our loan fees and repayment page.

I haven''t received an email response about my loan? What do I do?

Sometimes email can land in your "Junk Email" or "Spam" folder – check there first to see if you''ve received an email from us. If you can''t find it there, you can email us at customerservice@moneymutual.com and we will try to respond as quickly as possible.

If MoneyMutual isn''t a lender, why should I use your service?

We help you find a lender for free! Instead of waiting in line or searching for lenders online, our service can help make getting the cash you need easier and faster. And it means you may have a better chance of getting matched with a lender who can meet your needs! Lenders in our dedicated network also agree to follow our Code of Lender Conduct for your safety, security and protection.

I am self-employed. Can I still get a loan?

You may still qualify if you''re self-employed. If you make at least $800 a month, and meet other lender requirements, you may be able to get a loan. Other conditions may apply and will vary from lender to lender. When we ask for your Employer information in our form, please give us the legal name of your corporate entity and the main phone number of the business.

What do you do with my information? Do you keep my information?

We are committed to your privacy and the security of your personal information. Please read our privacy policy to understand exactly what we do with your information and how it is protected. We''ve also created a Code of Lender Conduct with participating lenders, in which they agree not to sell or share your information.

What if I don''t have my employer''s phone number or address?

We require you to provide your employer''s name and business phone number. You''re not required to provide the address on our site, though.

Is your site secure?

We use 128-bit encryption from Verisign as well as McAfee Secure to scan our site daily for bad software.

What are the terms and details of my loan?

Because we aren''t a lender, that information isn''t available to us. If you are matched with a lender, they will send you all the terms and conditions of your loan offer. It will include the interest rate, dates for repayment, finance charges, and more. Different lenders offer different kinds of loans with different details. Remember, you have a choice whether or not you want to accept the loan offer. If you don''t agree to the terms, you can decline the loan offer and apply again.

How do I qualify? Is having bad or no credit OK?

Qualifying can be very easy, and participating lenders in our network work with many people in bad credit situations. Here are the basic qualifications:

  • Currently have a job (or receive regular income)
  • Make at least $800 per month
  • Are 18 years of age or older and a U.S. resident
  • Have a checking account

Remember that other requirements may apply based on your individual lender. If you have bad credit, you might still be able to be matched with a lender.

How soon do I get my money?

Typically, if you''re approved and you accept the loan offer, you may be able to get the money deposited directly in as little as 24 hours. It''s very similar to depositing a check at the bank in that the funds need time to clear. If you''re approved on a business day, weekend, or holiday, that may also make a difference in how long it will take for you to get your money.

Why do you need my banking information before I am approved?

Lenders need to make sure they can make a direct deposit into a valid bank account if you accept a loan offer. Applying at MoneyMutual.com is totally free, which means you won''t be charged with an application fee.

Why do you need my employer''s phone number? Are you going to contact my employer?

Because we are not a lender, we won''t contact your employer. Remember, our form is asking for the main number of your employer, so make sure you are providing the correct one. Every lender is different; however, to verify your employment, some lenders may call your employer at the number you provide.

Can I pick my payments? When is the first payment due?

The dates of repayment can vary from lender to lender and depending on your qualifications. In most cases, you won''t be able to pick the dates of your payments. If you''ve been given a loan offer, you should contact the lender with any questions that deal with payment before accepting the terms of the loan. Learn more about payments on our loan fees and repayment page.

Can I get a loan if I have a savings account? What if I get paid with a prepaid debit card?

While qualifications can vary from lender to lender, most lenders will require that you have a valid checking account so they can deposit the funds directly. Unfortunately, lenders can''t deposit directly into a pre-paid debit card.

', 1, GETDATE(), GETDATE()); DELETE FROM Article WHERE ArticleId = 1671334075754167042; INSERT INTO Article ([ArticleId] ,[DateCreated] ,[DateModified] ,[ArticlePageId] ,[Title] ,[MetaDescription] ,[MetaKeywords] ,[HeaderImageAltText] ,[HtmlContentId] ,[ManagementApproved] ,[LegalApproved] ,[Author] ,[Revision] ,[UrlAccessible] ,[LiveAccessible] ,[WebsiteId] ,[PageName] ,[HeaderContent] ,[MainTemplate] ,[MobileTemplate] ,[ModalTemplate] ,[MobileUserExperienceId] ,[SerializedArticleRegions] ) VALUES (1671334075754167042 ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,NULL ,'Frequently Asked Questions | MoneyMutual.com ' ,'Shows some of the most frequestly asked question about MoneyMutual, as well as answers to those questions.' ,'Money Mutual, Frequently Asked Questions' ,'' ,1671334075754167042 ,1 ,1 ,'david.maple' ,1 ,1 ,1 ,5484604087494250496 ,'questions' ,'' ,'/templates/Silo.xhtml' ,'/mobile/MobileSilo.xhtml' ,'/templates/ModalArticleTemplate.xhtml' ,3226773266688846570 ,'' ); -- test article DELETE FROM HtmlContent WHERE HtmlContentId = 1671334075754167041; INSERT INTO HtmlContent (HtmlContentId, Name, Text, Active, DateCreated, DateModified) VALUES (1671334075754167041, 'test version: questions', '

Can I get a loan if I have a savings account? What if I get paid with a prepaid debit card?

While qualifications can vary from lender to lender, most lenders will require that you have a valid checking account so they can deposit the funds directly. Unfortunately, lenders can''t deposit directly into a pre-paid debit card.

Have you ever found yourself with an unexpected car repair, have a bill that''s just a little too high this month, or some other emergency? You aren''t the only one. Sometimes the unforeseen can happen when your next payday is too far away and you don''t have the time to stand in a long line – and you need an online payday loan, quickly. Money Mutual may be able to help! We are a free lender-matching service that connects borrowers to one of the largest lending networks in the United States.

The participating lenders in our network understand that there are many people who have been affected by the economy when it isn''t their fault. They could help you find the short term cash you''re looking for – all while being fast, private, and secure.

 

For more information please see the HOW IT WORKS section of our web site.

 

Money Mutual Payday Loans & Cash Advance Lender Matching Service

Loans online can be faster, easier, and more private than going to the payday store. In many cases, a source of income (typically your paycheck) will back these loans. Short-term loans are aimed at people like you who have an unforeseen emergency such as a medical crisis or unexpected bills. Some of the many names you''ll see these loans go by online include:

  • Payday loans
  • Cash advance loans
  • Personal loans
  • Installment loans
  • Short Term Loan

What makes these loans more and more popular is that they aren''t just convenient, but they can also be a great way to avoid huge reconnect fees, late fees, and other hits creditors can make on your accounts. Because the economy''s downturn in recent years affected the U.S. banking system in such a negative way, many people have found themselves "under banked," meaning they''re being told they can''t get loans from their banks or credit unions. We''re here to help when the bank says no. Here are just a few of the reasons why you should use Money Mutual:

  • You could possibly get the money you need in as little as 24 hours. If you see promises of "1-hour online payday loan" or "1-hour cash advance loans," don''t be fooled. Even though being approved for a loan can be very quick, you probably won''t get your cash in an hour. If you are approved and you accept your loan offer, the way you get your money is very similar to depositing your paycheck at the bank. You usually have to wait at least 24 hours before the money is deposited into your checking account.
  • Participating lenders agree not to share your personal information. We''ve created a Code of Lender Conduct with participating lenders, where lenders agree not to sell or share your information. Lenders not acting in accordance with the Code of Lender Conduct may be subject to suspension and/or possible termination from our network of participating lenders.
  • Don''t waste your time standing in line! We''ve taken steps to help make sure that entering your information on MoneyMutual.com is secure and private. With your desktop computer, laptop, or mobile device, getting matched with a participating lender takes only a few clicks (or finger presses) to get started. Using MoneyMutual''s payday loan cash advance lender matching services means you can borrow safely and securely without standing in embarrassing lines.

Over a million people have turned to Money Mutual. Here''s why:

  • Up to $1,000 could be directly deposited as soon as tomorrow*: Filling out our form only takes a few minutes, and approval happens quickly. In as little as 24 hours, you could have up to $1,000 directly deposited into your checking account.
  • Our form is easy, and only takes 5 minutes to complete: A few pieces of simple information could possibly get you matched with a lender in mere minutes.
  • Montel Williams exclusively endorses Money Mutual: Daytime Emmy Award winner and celebrated talk show host Montel Williams only endorses products that help people live better in all aspects of their lives. He understands that the economic downturn has left a lot of people with bad credit and expenses that pile up. Sometimes a cash advance loan can provide quick needed assistance and help avoid more costly fees.
  • We use Verisign''s 128-Bit encryption to help make your information secure:Verisign is one of the most trusted names in online security. Their 128-bit encryption helps protect your personal information when you submit it on our site.
  • We are an Online Lenders Alliance member: The OLA is dedicated to informing borrowers about the online lending industry. As a proud member, we believe that customers should be fully informed and treated fairly.
  • 24/7 customer service: We want to make sure your questions are answered quickly. That''s why our goal is to provide the best customer service available. We are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week by phone or email.

#{htmlContentBean.getHtml(''moneymutual.googlePaidSearchDynamicHomePageContent'')}

Remember – we''re here to help match you with a lender when you need emergency cash, quickly, privately, and securely. It''s fast and easy to get a short term cash payday loan with MoneyMutual''s lender matching services. Please use loans responsibly. Click here to learn more.

The MoneyMutual Lender Matching Service is proud to be currently rated 4.7/5 based on 3482 customer reviews collected from our Customer Satisfaction Survey.

Money Mutual > Payday Loans > Online Advantages
  • Payday Loans
    • Same Day Payday Loans
    • Instant Payday Loans
    • Payday Loans Online
    • How Short Term Loans Work
    • How Payday Loans Work
    • What are Faxless Payday Loans
    • Types of Payday Loans
    • Legitimate Lenders Online
    • Online Advantages
    • Fast Payday Loans Online
    • How To Qualify
  • Cash Advance
  • Bad Credit Loans
  • Montel Williams
 

Advantages of Online Payday Loans

Many people have found themselves in a surprise financial emergency, and end up trying to get a loan from their banks and credit unions, only to be turned down. In most cases, they''re turned down through no fault of their own. If this has happened to you, you aren''t the only one. Because the economy has ruined many people''s credit, they''ve found themselves needing cash and being told "no." These people don''t have the time to travel to a loan store and stand in line, and they feel embarrassed thinking of asking their families for help. For those who need funds securely, privately, and quickly, going online could be the best option for them.

Money Mutual was created for people who are looking for a loan, but don''t have time to wait in line. We put together one of the largest lender networks in the U.S. that people can connect to for free to find a lender. Why should you go online?

  • Privacy: Waiting in line for a loan doesn''t sound inviting to most people. Going online means you can apply easily by computer or mobile device from the privacy of your own home. One of the ways we keep your information safe is by partnering with TRUSTe, one of the most reliable privacy protection companies on the web.
  • Speed: Filling out Money Mutual''s secure forms only takes minutes, and you could get approval in real time. As soon as you accept an offer, up to $1,000 could be deposited directly into your account in as little as 24 hours
  • Security: When it comes to your information, we make sure to use secure verification, as well as utilize McAfee Secure to scan our site daily for identity thieves and dangerous software.

"We put together one of the largest lender networks in the U.S."
The process is simple. Just fill out the required information at MoneyMutual.com and then it''s only one click to submit. Based on the information you provide, we attempt to match you with a lender in real time. If we can match you, you''ll be forwarded on to the lender''s website, where you may have to fill out a few pieces of information – including email, home address, phone number, or other information.

If you''re approved after all your information is given, the lender will more than likely email you the terms and conditions of your loan offer. Details of the terms will include fees, the interest rate, finance charges, and more. Remember, you can choose to accept or decline the offer if you do not agree to the terms. Make sure you take your time in looking over them to make sure you can understand them. Should you have any questions, make sure you contact your lender at the contact information they provide.

Making sure you borrow responsibly is important. You can do that by making sure you will be able repay the loan on time and in full. Also make sure you have the money in your bank account so you can avoid further charges for missed payments. If you think you may have a late repayment, immediately contact the lender.

There are quite a few advantages to going online for a payday loan. You could save time, apply privately, and know that your information is kept secure, all from the convenience of your home. Money Mutual can help you get matched with a participating lender online instead of waiting in long lines.

  • Privacy: Waiting in line for a loan doesn''t sound inviting to most people. Going online means you can apply easily by computer or mobile device from the privacy of your own home. Make sure you take your time in looking over them to make sure you can understand them. Should you have any questions, make sure you contact your lender at the contact information they provide.

Also make sure you have the money in your bank account so you can avoid further charges for missed payments. If you think you may have a late repayment, immediately contact the lender.

MS RUN THE US

Sponsorship

MS Run the US Inc. has sponsorship proposals that feature the benefits of each sponsor and in-kind donations are also graciously accepted to help support this run.

MS Run the US is proudly endorsed by Montel Williams & The Montel Williams MS Foundation

OCT. 16, 2010

Merci

[ INSPIRED BY JILL''S 28 YEAR STRUGGLE WITH MS ]

There''s big risk in starting something from scratch, especially when it''s an endeavor that is very uncharted (like running across a continent). That''s essentially what I did when I started MS Run the US, Inc. I literally dove headfirst into uncharted territory. It wasn''t completely uncharted in the sense that I had been a runner my whole life, but it was absolutely new territory in the way of non-profit work & sponsorship work. (Also, the running ultra-endurance side of it was uncharted due to my lack of ultra-endurance experience). But you get the picture; I basically risked it all for a big dream to raise money.

It was completely obvious that I was risking it all as well. As poised as I wanted to seem, any person with half a brain could see that I was treading on unfamiliar grounds. I wanted everyone to trust me and support me, without any question or reason as to why. What I didn''t realize fully is that by supporting me with their reputation or resources, in failure, they would also fail, and when people spend their whole lives building a reputation, that''s a lot to ask.

Well, it was a lot to ask, until an individual and Foundation, with more to lose than most, stepped up to the plate. In the spring of 2009 when I was working hard on building MS Run the US, Inc., I was also in contact with The Montel Williams MS Foundation. It wasn''t rocket science to figure out that gaining the support of a national celebrity might give the run some leverage. Fortunately for MS Run the US, Inc., I was able to get in touch with someone in the organization that thought this run was an amazing idea.

A few months after my first contact with The Montel Williams MS Foundation I was able to provide them with a sponsorship proposal that caught their attention. Though they weren''t offering to sponsor the run themselves, they were willing to endorse the idea & use their contact to help find sponsorship to fund the run!

I still remember getting the call from my contact at the Foundation, letting me know that they loved the proposal and the idea, and that Montel was willing to put his name on the run! After I hung up the phone I told my Mom & started jumping up and down with her in the living room of our house. (Mom was so excited she asked right away if we were going to be on Oprah -- a little bit of a leap -- but that''s beside the point. Haha. We were just excited.)

A year after that phone call, we stood at the finish with Montel Williams by our side!

From there on my relationship grew with Montel''s business partner, Melanie, and The Montel Williams MS Foundation (MWMSF). Though they had faced some hard times with sponsorship recently, they were willing to help us gain funding to allow the run to be possible. Not only was I grateful for the attention they would give my dream, but they were more than willing to help it become a reality. I think what Melanie & Montel decided to do last year for MS Run the US, Inc. is so amazing. I mean, picture this: a 25 year old daughter, who wants to attempt to run a marathon a day across America for Multiple Sclerosis, that has minimal funding & resources, with a goal of raising half a million dollars in the process. And I was flat out asking Montel Williams, national celebrity, ex-Marine, with a family & his own disease symptoms, to put his name & resources on the line to support this fund raising idea. Seriously, just imagine the hundreds of thousands of people that contact this man and his Foundation every year for support of ideas that probably have much more sound backing.

"Money is like manure; it''s not worth a thing unless it''s spread around encouraging young things to grow."

~Thornton Wilder

This is exactly what they did at MWMSF. They took a chance with MS Run the US Inc. But in my proposal, they saw potential for something great to happen and they wanted to be a part of it. I don''t know this for sure, but I have a feeling that people took chances on them at times in their life as well. They were up for a promotion or an opportunity, and though maybe they weren''t fully prepared to be there at that time, someone took a chance on them, which allowed them to be great.

The thing is is that great people rarely achieve greatness on their own. Somewhere along the way their enthusiasm & determination broke through to someone in a better position to them and pulled them up in the ranks. Someone said, "You''ve got a good spirit, kid, and I''m going to help you."

Montel supporting the run in our Go The Distance tee next to the
MoneyMutual.com Logo

Coincidentally it was the support of the MWMSF that lead to the title sponsor of MS Run the US Inc. Though Andrew and I had been able to collect some local support to financially help the cost of the run, we were far short of our monetary goal. The online lending company MoneyMutual.com was the only company that put a large monetary value on the significance they felt towards the run. (Though that''s not to say other companies didn''t wish they could do more‚ because I know many Milwaukee local business would have put down large sums of money if they could!). But really MoneyMutual.com was the only one that able to financially support and also followed up with the sponsorship check just days before we started actually running!

Designed with you in mind is right!!! They definitely were all about us :)

I know that the run would not have been as successful without the support of The Montel Williams MS Foundation and MoneyMutual.com. We owe a huge thanks to both of these companies, though some how "Thank You" never seems enough when putting a value on others that have helped you accomplish a dream that have risked a great deal in the process.

MS RUN THE US

Sponsorship

MS Run the US Inc. has sponsorship proposals that feature the benefits of each sponsor and in-kind donations are also graciously accepted to help support this run.

MS Run the US is proudly endorsed by Montel Williams & The Montel Williams MS Foundation

OCT. 16, 2010

Merci

[ INSPIRED BY JILL''S 28 YEAR STRUGGLE WITH MS ]

There''s big risk in starting something from scratch, especially when it''s an endeavor that is very uncharted (like running across a continent). That''s essentially what I did when I started MS Run the US, Inc. I literally dove headfirst into uncharted territory. It wasn''t completely uncharted in the sense that I had been a runner my whole life, but it was absolutely new territory in the way of non-profit work & sponsorship work. (Also, the running ultra-endurance side of it was uncharted due to my lack of ultra-endurance experience). But you get the picture; I basically risked it all for a big dream to raise money.

It was completely obvious that I was risking it all as well. As poised as I wanted to seem, any person with half a brain could see that I was treading on unfamiliar grounds. I wanted everyone to trust me and support me, without any question or reason as to why. What I didn''t realize fully is that by supporting me with their reputation or resources, in failure, they would also fail, and when people spend their whole lives building a reputation, that''s a lot to ask.

Well, it was a lot to ask, until an individual and Foundation, with more to lose than most, stepped up to the plate. In the spring of 2009 when I was working hard on building MS Run the US, Inc., I was also in contact with The Montel Williams MS Foundation. It wasn''t rocket science to figure out that gaining the support of a national celebrity might give the run some leverage. Fortunately for MS Run the US, Inc., I was able to get in touch with someone in the organization that thought this run was an amazing idea.

A few months after my first contact with The Montel Williams MS Foundation I was able to provide them with a sponsorship proposal that caught their attention. Though they weren''t offering to sponsor the run themselves, they were willing to endorse the idea & use their contact to help find sponsorship to fund the run!

I still remember getting the call from my contact at the Foundation, letting me know that they loved the proposal and the idea, and that Montel was willing to put his name on the run! After I hung up the phone I told my Mom & started jumping up and down with her in the living room of our house. (Mom was so excited she asked right away if we were going to be on Oprah -- a little bit of a leap -- but that''s beside the point. Haha. We were just excited.)

A year after that phone call, we stood at the finish with Montel Williams by our side!

From there on my relationship grew with Montel''s business partner, Melanie, and The Montel Williams MS Foundation (MWMSF). Though they had faced some hard times with sponsorship recently, they were willing to help us gain funding to allow the run to be possible. Not only was I grateful for the attention they would give my dream, but they were more than willing to help it become a reality. I think what Melanie & Montel decided to do last year for MS Run the US, Inc. is so amazing. I mean, picture this: a 25 year old daughter, who wants to attempt to run a marathon a day across America for Multiple Sclerosis, that has minimal funding & resources, with a goal of raising half a million dollars in the process. And I was flat out asking Montel Williams, national celebrity, ex-Marine, with a family & his own disease symptoms, to put his name & resources on the line to support this fund raising idea. Seriously, just imagine the hundreds of thousands of people that contact this man and his Foundation every year for support of ideas that probably have much more sound backing.

"Money is like manure; it''s not worth a thing unless it''s spread around encouraging young things to grow."

~Thornton Wilder

I don''t know this for sure, but I have a feeling that people took chances on them at times in their life as well. They were up for a promotion or an opportunity, and though maybe they weren''t fully prepared to be there at that time, someone took a chance on them, which allowed them to be great.

MoneyMutual.com Logo

Money Mutual > Payday Loans > How Payday Loans Work
  • Payday Loans
    • Same Day Payday Loans
    • Instant Payday Loans
    • Payday Loans Online
    • How Short Term Loans Work
    • How Payday Loans Work
    • What are Faxless Payday Loans
    • Types of Payday Loans
    • Legitimate Lenders Online
    • Online Advantages
    • Fast Payday Loans Online
    • How To Qualify
  • Cash Advance
  • Bad Credit Loans
  • Montel Williams
 

How Payday Loans Work


One of the unfortunate things in life is an emergency that comes from nowhere, and you don''t have money until your next payday, which is too far away. If you ever find yourself in this kind of situation, a payday loan online may be an option for you. As you may know, payment for this kind of loan is typically due on your next payday, but you might not be familiar with the rest of the process. In most cases, it''s fast, easy, and best of all, safe.

Typically, when someone gets a payday loan at a payday loan store, the lender will hold on to your paycheck until your next payday comes, and then will cash the check on payday in order to pay back the loan. However, in recent years, payday loan lenders have gone online, and don''t require a paper check. They typically ask to take out the repayment directly from your checking account when the loan is due.

Payday loans have the advantage of immediately helping you cover an unexpected emergency, such as a medical crisis or surprise bill, when payday is too far away. These kinds of loans can differ from traditional loans, and sometimes have simpler requirements that can help quicken the process. In most cases, being 18 years or older, having a bank account in good standing, the ability to prove regular income, and other qualifications are required.

"with the explosion of the web, borrowers are going online"
Keep in mind that many states have passed laws and regulations in regard to how short-term payday loans work. Many of these state laws are made to limit finance charges that lenders charge in particular states. Payday loan lenders who are reputable should be following all applicable laws, and must tell you about the complete terms of any loan offer in writing. In an effort to make customers'' information safe, Money Mutual has created a Code of Lender Conduct to reinforce that our customers should be treated with respect and fairness. Lenders who participate in our network that don''t adhere to the Code are subject to suspension from our lender network.

At first, only payday loan stores, rent-to-own companies, check cashing stores, and pawn shops offered payday loans. But with the explosion of the web, borrowers are going online to take advantage of the speed and convenience of the Internet. Money Mutual has created a network of participating lenders who may be able to help you have a better chance of getting a loan through MoneyMutual.com.

Our free lender-matching service will attempt to match you with a participating lender in our network based on the information you provide. If you''re matched, you''ll be taken to the lender''s site and given a loan offer. If you agree and sign the offer, you could have cash deposited in as little as 24 hours afterward.

Sometimes the unforeseen happens, and your next paycheck is too far away to cover your emergency. Getting a payday loan may be your best option when you need safe and fast cash to cover any unforeseen difficulty. Make sure you learn how payday loans work before signing up. We can help match you with the right lender who may even be able to get you the money you need in as little as 24 hours!

', 1, GETDATE(), GETDATE()); DELETE FROM Article WHERE ArticleId = 3147011755412710646; INSERT INTO Article ([ArticleId] ,[DateCreated] ,[DateModified] ,[ArticlePageId] ,[Title] ,[MetaDescription] ,[MetaKeywords] ,[HeaderImageAltText] ,[HtmlContentId] ,[ManagementApproved] ,[LegalApproved] ,[Author] ,[Revision] ,[UrlAccessible] ,[LiveAccessible] ,[WebsiteId] ,[PageName] ,[HeaderContent] ,[MainTemplate] ,[MobileTemplate] ,[ModalTemplate] ,[MobileUserExperienceId] ,[SerializedArticleRegions] ) VALUES (3147011755412710646 ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,NULL ,'Learn How Payday Loans Work | MoneyMutual' ,'Want to know how payday loans work online? Money Mutual explains how getting a payday loan online could be an option when you need cash fast.' ,'How Short Term Payday Loans Work, Short Term Payday Loans Online, Short Term Payday Loans, Short Term Loans, Payday Loans, Money Mutual' ,'' ,3100531483957603223 ,1 ,1 ,'david.maple' ,1 ,1 ,1 ,5484604087494250496 ,'payday-loans/how-payday-loans-work' ,'' ,'/templates/Silo.xhtml' ,'/mobile/MobileSilo.xhtml' ,'/templates/ModalArticleTemplate.xhtml' ,3226773266688846570 ,'' ); -- test article DELETE FROM HtmlContent WHERE HtmlContentId = 3537876254406353765; INSERT INTO HtmlContent (HtmlContentId, Name, Text, Active, DateCreated, DateModified) VALUES (3537876254406353765, 'Article Test: 3537876254406353765', '

How Payday Loans Work


One of the unfortunate things in life is an emergency that comes from nowhere, and you don''t have money until your next payday, which is too far away. If you ever find yourself in this kind of situation, a payday loan online may be an option for you. As you may know, payment for this kind of loan is typically due on your next payday, but you might not be familiar with the rest of the process. In most cases, it''s fast, easy, and best of all, safe.

Typically, when someone gets a payday loan at a payday loan store, the lender will hold on to your paycheck until your next payday comes, and then will cash the check on payday in order to pay back the loan. However, in recent years, payday loan lenders have gone online, and don''t require a paper check. They typically ask to take out the repayment directly from your checking account when the loan is due.

Payday loans have the advantage of immediately helping you cover an unexpected emergency, such as a medical crisis or surprise bill, when payday is too far away. These kinds of loans can differ from traditional loans, and sometimes have simpler requirements that can help quicken the process. In most cases, being 18 years or older, having a bank account in good standing, the ability to prove regular income, and other qualifications are required.

"with the explosion of the web, borrowers are going online"
Keep in mind that many states have passed laws and regulations in regard to how short-term payday loans work. Many of these state laws are made to limit finance charges that lenders charge in particular states. Payday loan lenders who are reputable should be following all applicable laws, and must tell you about the complete terms of any loan offer in writing. In an effort to make customers'' information safe, Money Mutual has created a Code of Lender Conduct to reinforce that our customers should be treated with respect and fairness. Lenders who participate in our network that don''t adhere to the Code are subject to suspension from our lender network.

At first, only payday loan stores, rent-to-own companies, check cashing stores, and pawn shops offered payday loans. But with the explosion of the web, borrowers are going online to take advantage of the speed and convenience of the Internet. Money Mutual has created a network of participating lenders who may be able to help you have a better chance of getting a loan through MoneyMutual.com.

Our free lender-matching service will attempt to match you with a participating lender in our network based on the information you provide. If you''re matched, you''ll be taken to the lender''s site and given a loan offer. If you agree and sign the offer, you could have cash deposited in as little as 24 hours afterward.

Sometimes the unforeseen happens, and your next paycheck is too far away to cover your emergency. Getting a payday loan may be your best option when you need safe and fast cash to cover any unforeseen difficulty. Make sure you learn how payday loans work before signing up. We can help match you with the right lender who may even be able to get you the money you need in as little as 24 hours!

Ready to Use Your MyMoneyMutualNow Cash Card?

Welcome! We know that many people these days may need up to $500 fast, especially in times like these.

Sometimes life hands you emergencies that are beyond your control – whether you have an unexpected expense, your bills are piling up, or you just need to get by until your next payday – and you don''t have time to wait in line and deal with the hassle and embarrassment of the payday loan store. You aren''t the only one! That''s where your MyMoneyMutualNow Emergency Cash Card from Money Mutual could come in handy.

“short-term cash loans, sometimes referred to as bad credit loans, may be a viable choice ”

By entering the Reservation Number on your Emergency Cash Card and submitting your information, you may be able to be matched with a participating lender in one of the largest lending networks in the country, and you could possibly have up to $500 directly deposited into your bank account in as little as 24 hours! The Reservation Number is exclusively for you, and it''s easy to get started by entering it and following the instructions. Within minutes, you could be approved by a participating lender!

How does the process work? Just enter your number and follow the instructions. The process is easy and only takes minutes. Once you''ve finished filling out your information, just click to submit. Based on the information you provide, you may be matched with a participating lender. If you are matched with a lender, you''ll be forwarded on to the lender''s website, where you''ll be able to apply for a loan. It''s possible the lender may ask you for additional information like your email address, home address, and phone number.

If you''re approved, the lender will provide you with the terms and conditions of your loan offer. These terms will include details such as finance charges, fees, the interest rate, and more. Remember, you have a choice to accept or decline your loan offer. If you don''t agree to the terms and conditions of the loan offer, you are not obligated to accept it. Make sure you read over the loan terms carefully and that you understand them fully. The lender should send you its contact information along with the loan offer, so if you have any questions, you should contact the lender directly. If you make the choice to accept the loan offer, you could possibly have the money directly deposited into your bank account in as little as 24 hours.

We strongly encourage responsible borrowing. One of the best ways to do that is to make sure you are able to repay the loan on time and in full. You can avoid further charges by ensuring that you have the money in your account. If you think there is a possibility you won''t be able to repay the loan on time, contact the lender directly at the contact information they''ve provided.

At Money Mutual, we know that going online for emergency cash can be easier and more convenient than driving to the payday store. Why use MyMoneyMutualNow?

  • Privacy. From the privacy of your laptop, home computer or mobile device, you don''t have to wait in embarrassing lines to get the money you need. We''ve teamed up with McAfee, one of the industry leaders in privacy protection on the web, to help make sure your information is kept safe from prying eyes.
  • Speed. We know you don''t have time to wait in line at the payday store. The submission process takes mere minutes, and approval is made in real time – meaning you could have the money you need in as little as 24 hours.
  • Security. We use McAfee Secure to scan our site daily for identity thieves and bad software. We also use secure verification to help keep your information protected.

Ready to go? Just enter your Reservation Number on you emergency cash card and get started. You could possibly have the cash you need in as little as 24 hours!

For more information please see the HOW IT WORKS section of our website.

 

', 1, GETDATE(), GETDATE()); DELETE FROM Article WHERE ArticleId = 4585116341898184180; INSERT INTO Article ([ArticleId] ,[DateCreated] ,[DateModified] ,[ArticlePageId] ,[Title] ,[MetaDescription] ,[MetaKeywords] ,[HeaderImageAltText] ,[HtmlContentId] ,[ManagementApproved] ,[LegalApproved] ,[Author] ,[Revision] ,[UrlAccessible] ,[LiveAccessible] ,[WebsiteId] ,[PageName] ,[HeaderContent] ,[MainTemplate] ,[MobileTemplate] ,[ModalTemplate] ,[MobileUserExperienceId] ,[SerializedArticleRegions] ) VALUES (4585116341898184180 ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,NULL ,'MyMoneyMutualNow Reservation - Emergency Cash Card by MyMoneyMutualNow.com' ,'Did you receive an Emergency Cash Card in the mail?
