Types of Loans with Bad Credit


The economy''s downturn has made big dents in many people''s credit, and it has made them afraid to apply for a loan when an unexpected crisis happens. Bad credit can mean a low credit score, and that could make getting a loan from a bank or a credit union difficult, at best. In fact, many people are finding themselves turned down for loans from banks and credit unions. Lenders who specialize in loans for people with poor credit may be able to help by offering different types of what are called "bad credit loans." With responsible borrowing, you may be able to get the cash you need for your emergency situation. Here are a few of the different types of loans you may be able to qualify for if you have bad credit:

  • Payday Loans: If you''re approved for a payday loan, lenders generally will expect you to repay the loan on your next payday, although terms on payday loans may vary depending on the lender. You may be able to qualify for a payday loan if you are 18 years of age or older, have a valid checking account and a regular source of income such as a job or retirement or disability income; however, other requirements may apply based on individual lender requirements.
  • Installment Loan with Bad Credit: If you have bad credit due to the economy, you may still be able to qualify for an installment loan. Installment loans offer regular, often monthly, payments over a fixed period of time. If you''re approved for an installment loan when you have bad credit, be sure to read over the terms and conditions of your loan carefully, and don''t hesitate to ask your lender any questions you may have about the loan before accepting it.
  • Pawn Shops and Car Title Lenders: Some people choose bad credit loans from pawn shops or car title lenders when an emergency occurs. In this scenario, you are asked to put up collateral in order to secure timely payments. One of the risks involved with these kinds of loans is the possible loss of your collateral if you fail to repay the loan as agreed.
  • No Fax Bad Credit Loans: With no fax loans, you typically do not have to fax the lender documentation (such as a pay stub or a page from your checking account) as part of the application process.
"You are not alone when it comes to your credit being damaged by the economy"

If you are approved for a loan with bad credit, remember that you are not obligated to accept the loan if you disagree with the terms or feel you cannot pay the money back. Lenders vary, so some lenders may offer better terms and interest rates than others. There are many different types of bad credit loans online, so always read the terms and conditions of your loan offer carefully before accepting it.

You are not alone when it comes to your credit being damaged by the economy. Emergencies happen all the time, and if you''re afraid a bad credit score may impact your ability to get a loan, remember that you have various options to helping you get bad credit loans. If you''re looking for a lender, Money Mutual will attempt to match you with a participating lender who could get you emergency funds quickly, safely, and securely.

Business Cash Advance Loans


Much like personal loans, entrepreneurs also sometimes need quick capital to jumpstart or grow their businesses. If you are one of these business owners, a cash advance loan may be an option for your small company. Business cash advance loans are now available for entrepreneurs, sole proprietors, and others engaged in business.

A lack of access to capital can be one of the biggest problems with succeeding in business. If you’re running a mom and pop business out of your house you may need a small loan to carry you over until some of your vendors pay you for work you have performed. For example, it can take months to receive payment for a job that you performed for a state or local government. Even big companies may take up to 60 to 90 days to pay their vendors.

In the meantime, while you wait for checks to come in, your small business could slowly starve. That’s where business cash advances come in. That’s why some lenders are now starting to offer business cash advances.

"Business cash advance loans are now available for entrepreneurs, sole proprietors, and others engaged in business"
Cash Advance lenders set their own terms for these kinds of loans, and they can vary from lender to lender. In one instance, a lender might grant your business a loan based on money you expect to collect on outstanding invoices. You would show the lender the invoices, estimate when you expect to receive payment, and based on these and other factors discussed with the lender, you may be offered a business cash advance. In some instances, a lender might offer your business a business cash advance based on future sales the business expects.

To qualify for a business cash advance online, your business should be established, meaning it’s a serious enterprise and has customers. You may also be required to establish that the business has a business checking account at a financial institution, as well as possibly your own personal checking account. Other requirements may apply.

It’s very important to handle business cash advance loans responsibly. Lenders may require you to personally guarantee the business loans, meaning that even if your business fails you’ll be responsible for repayment. If your business is approved, make sure to take the time and read over the terms and conditions of your offer carefully before signing any documentation.

', 1, GETDATE(), GETDATE()); DELETE FROM Article WHERE ArticleId = 3891383820397793910; INSERT INTO Article ([ArticleId] ,[DateCreated] ,[DateModified] ,[ArticlePageId] ,[Title] ,[MetaDescription] ,[MetaKeywords] ,[HeaderImageAltText] ,[HtmlContentId] ,[ManagementApproved] ,[LegalApproved] ,[Author] ,[Revision] ,[UrlAccessible] ,[LiveAccessible] ,[WebsiteId] ,[PageName] ,[HeaderContent] ,[MainTemplate] ,[MobileTemplate] ,[ModalTemplate] ,[MobileUserExperienceId] ,[SerializedArticleRegions] ) VALUES (3891383820397793910 ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,NULL ,'What is a Business Cash Advance Loan? | Money Mutual' ,'Is a business cash advance loan the same as personal cash advance? Business Cash Advance Loans

If your business is approved, make sure to take the time and read over the terms and conditions of your offer carefully before signing any documentation.

$500 MoneyMutual Survey Sweepstakes

OFFICIAL RULES

NO PURCHASE OR PAYMENT NECESSARY TO ENTER OR WIN.  ALL ENTRIES HAVE AN EQUAL CHANCE OF WINNING. VOID WHERE PROHIBITED BY LAW.

1. Description of Sweepstakes Offers: This $500 MoneyMutual Survey Sweepstakes (“Sweepstakes”) is sponsored by MoneyMutual ("Sponsor"). Sponsor will award one (1) prize of $500 to one (1) winner (see Section 6 for odds of winning), selected in a random drawing of all Valid Entries received during the Sweepstakes Promotion Period (“Drawing”). Multiple creative representations of the prize may be promoted through multiple web sites or media. Only one (1) prize will be awarded across all participating web sites and media. All Valid Entries have an equal chance of winning. Entries may be submitted through any permitted online method of entry described in these Official Rules.

2. Sweepstakes Promotion Period: The Sweepstakes’ promotion period shall begin at 12:00:00 am Pacific Standard Time ("PST") on August 22, 2013 and end at 11:59:59 pm Pacific Standard Time ("PST") on September 21, 2013 (the "Promotion Period"). All Entries must be received during the Promotion Period to be eligible for the prize Drawing. A Sweepstakes winner will be drawn within fourteen (14) days of the end of the Promotion Period.

3. How to Enter: You may enter a Sweepstakes by choosing one of the two following methods of entry (“an “Entry”). You may enter by, either (1) clicking on the Get Started button in the email entitled “MoneyMutual wants your feedback” and complete and “submit” the survey; or (2) enter by mail by sending a properly post-marked 3.5” x 5.5” card, including your handwritten name, valid postal address, valid e-mail address and valid telephone number to MoneyMutual, c/o $500 MoneyMutual Survey Sweepstakes Entry, 8174 S Las Vegas Blvd. Suite #109-432 Las Vegas, NV 89123 (each a “Valid Method of Entry”). All mail-in Entries must be handwritten and received by September 22, 2013 to be valid. By entering a Sweepstakes, you (“Entrant”) agree to be notified by e-mail or telephone if you are the randomly selected winner of a Drawing.     

4. Valid Entries: In order to be valid and eligible for a Drawing, an entry must be submitted via an approved Method of Entry, and comply with all the requirements of these Official Rules (“Valid Entry”). Each Valid Entry will be entered into the Drawing for the Sweepstakes. Entries which are not received during the Promotion Period are not valid and shall not be eligible for any Drawing, whether or not sent during the Promotion Period. Only one (1) Entry per person and/or per e-mail address is permitted regardless of the Method of Entry. All required information must be included in the Entry; incomplete, illegible, misdirected, or inaccurate Entries, or Entries received through impermissible or illegitimate channels are void. Entries made with multiple e-mail addresses, under multiple identities or through the use of any agent or other device or artifice to enter multiple times during the Promotion Period will not be considered valid. Multiple Entrants are not permitted to share the same email address. Mechanically reproduced entries will not be eligible. Sponsor assumes no responsibility for incorrect or inaccurate entry information, human error or technical malfunctions, lost/delayed data transmission or postal delivery, omission, interruption, deletion, defect, line failures of any computer equipment or software, or any combination thereof, or for lost, stolen, late or misdirected Entries, whichever Method of Entry.

Each Entry must be in keeping with Sponsor’s image, and may not be offensive as determined by Sponsor in its sole and absolute discretion. Sponsor reserves all rights, including the right to edit, publish, use, adapt, modify, or dispose of any entrant’s Entry, proper names, likenesses, and photographs for advertising and promotional purposes in all media (including, but not limited to, the internet) without additional compensation, except where prohibited by law. Sponsor reserves the right, in its sole and absolute discretion, to remove any Entry that the Sponsor feels is inappropriate, objectionable, and/or inconsistent with the positive image and/or good will it wishes to promote in this Sweepstakes.

5. Eligibility: NO PURCHASE OR PAYMENT IS NECESSARY TO WIN. The Sweepstakes is open to legal residents of the fifty (50) United States (including the District of Columbia) who are at least eighteen (18) years of age or older. Employees of Sponsor and its respective parent company, related subsidiaries and affiliated companies, and advertising and promotion agencies including each of their immediate family members (parents, children, siblings, and their respective spouses regardless of where they live) and individuals living in the same households of the above, whether or not related, are not eligible to enter or win a Prize. Residents of Puerto Rico are not eligible. Void where prohibited or restricted by law. To be eligible to win, Entrants must have a valid email address and Entries must be received by Sponsor in the format designated in Section 3. By entering, Entrant agrees to abide by these Official Rules and the decisions of the Sponsor, which are final and binding.

6. Odds: The odds of winning a Sweepstakes is determined by the total number of Valid Entries received during the Promotion Period.

7. Description of Prize: One (1) prize of five hundred United States’ dollars ($500 USD) (“Prize”) will be awarded to one (1) random winner. No substitution, assignment or transfer of prize is permitted, except by Sponsor. All taxes, and any other costs and expenses associated with prize acceptance and use not specifically stated within these Official Rules as being provided, are the sole responsibility of the winner, including, without limitation, all federal, state, and local taxes. If the Prize winner is at least 18 years of age but still considered a minor in his/her state or place of residence, the Prize may be awarded in the name of his/her parent or legal guardian, who will be responsible for fulfilling all requirements imposed on the winner as set forth herein.

8. Drawing and Awarding of Sweepstakes Prize: A Drawing will be made from all Valid Entries received during Promotion Period of the Sweepstakes. Winner(s) will be notified by e-mail or by telephone within fourteen (14) days of the drawing. Except where prohibited, the selected winner must execute and return to Sponsor, within ten (10) days of being notified, an affidavit of Eligibility, Liability and Publicity Release in order to claim the Prize. Failure to comply with these Official Rules, failure to execute and return the required documents within ten (10) days of attempted delivery or the return of the Prize notification as undeliverable, may result in forfeiture of the Prize, in Sponsor’s sole discretion, which will be awarded to an alternate winner. Upon alternate winner''s failure to comply with these Official Rules, failure to execute and return the required documents within ten (10) days of attempted delivery or the return of the Prize notification as undeliverable, the alternate winner forfeits the Prize. In any event, there shall be no more than four (4) alternate winners, in Sponsor’s sole discretion. By accepting the Prize, winner agrees that Sponsor, its affiliates, distributors, advertising and promotional agencies and suppliers and all of their respective officers, directors, employees, representatives and agents shall have no liability for, and shall hold all such parties harmless against damage, loss or injury that may arise in whole or in part, directly or indirectly, from the acceptance, possession, use or misuse of Prizes or participation in this Sweepstakes. Offer void where prohibited.

9. Miscellaneous: This Sweepstakes is void where prohibited. The Sweepstakes is subject to all applicable laws in the United States. Void in Puerto Rico and where prohibited by law and in any country except the United States. Sponsor may prohibit entrants from participating in the Sweepstakes and disqualify entries if they attempt to disrupt the Sweepstakes or circumvent the rules, act in an un-sportsmanlike manner or act with intent to annoy or harass any other entrant or sponsor(s). Sponsor reserves the right to cancel or suspend the Sweepstakes, in its absolute discretion, for cause, including without limitation to protect against virus, bugs, unauthorized human intervention, causes beyond the control of the Sponsor or Promoters, inappropriate or objectionable use of the Sweepstakes, or to protect the integrity of the Sweepstakes or Sponsor’s business integrity, good will and/or good name. All Sponsor decisions are final. Sponsor makes no warranty, representation or guarantee, express or implied, in fact or in law, relative to the use of the Sweepstakes Prize including, but not limited to, quality, merchantability or fitness for a particular prize. In the unlikely event the Sponsor encounters technical or equipment failures such as telephone network lines failing, computer online systems failing, servers and/or provider services go down, or human error in connection with the sweepstakes, etc., the Sponsor and promoters will not be held responsible. Collection and handling of personally identifiable information will be in accordance with the Privacy Policy posted on MoneyMutual.com.

All Entrants acknowledge and agree that any and all information submitted in connection with this sweepstakes, including without limitation use of Entrant’s name and/or place of residence, is submitted on a non-confidential and non-proprietary basis and may be used by Sponsor, its agents and subsidiaries, for any and all advertising and promotional purposes, without further compensation, including, but not limited to, posting winner’s name on Sponsor’s website(s), Facebook or Twitter pages or otherwise in connection with the Sweepstakes, in perpetuity, worldwide, in any media now known or hereafter developed.

Entrants agree that any and all claims, disputes and causes of action arising out of or related to the Sweepstakes shall be resolved, without resort to any form of class action, exclusively by the appropriate courts in Clark County, Nevada in accordance with the laws of the State of Nevada, without giving effect to conflicts of law rules which would cause the application of the laws of any other jurisdiction.

10. Winner''s List: To see the winner of the Sweepstakes Drawing, visit www.facebook.com/moneymutual or https: //twitter.com/moneymutual.

11. Sponsor: The Sponsor of this Sweepstakes is MoneyMutual, 8174 S. Las Vegas, Blvd. Suite #109-432, Las Vegas, NV 89123.

Good Luck!

MoneyMutual Complaints

We welcome the opportunity to address any complaints, concerns or questions that you may have about our service. MoneyMutual believes that good customer service begins and ends with customer satisfaction. A satisfied customer is our best referral.

We have taken extra steps to provide you added customer support. In fact, MoneyMutual is one of the only companies in the industry to offer 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, customer support to assist our customers.

If you have a complaint, concern or a general question, please feel free to contact us via:

Email: customerservice@moneymutual.com

or

Toll free phone: #{controllerBean.customerServicePhoneNumber}.

If MoneyMutual is unable to resolve your complaint or answer your question, feel free to contact the Online Lender Alliance Consumer Hotline at 1-800-299-7585. This organization was established to ensure consumers are fully informed and fairly treated when using lending products online. We are a proud member of this association and comply with all of their best practices. To find out more information about the Online Lenders Alliance please go to www.onlinelendersalliance.org.

As with all reputable companies, we appreciate customer feedback to improve our services. Below is a list of the most common questions that we have found online or collected through customer service, with our response to each of these issues.

Is MoneyMutual a scam?

No, MoneyMutual is not a scam. We offer a legitimate service matching borrowers with lenders. MoneyMutual currently has a network of over 60 participating lenders. When you provide your information on our site, MoneyMutual will attempt to match you with a participating lender based on the information you provide. The decision whether to lend you money is at the sole discretion of the lender you are matched with.

I applied at MoneyMutual and now I am receiving threatening phone calls.

This is not due to you applying at MoneyMutual. MoneyMutual does not make collections calls and its lenders do not engage in these types of collections tactics. Under federal law, debt collectors may not abuse, use profanity or threaten you verbally or physically in connection with the collection of a debt. The Fair Debt Collection Practices Act (FDCPA) also prohibits debt collectors from lying about who they are or who they represent. You cannot be arrested for failing to pay a personal debt. If you are receiving these types of calls, please contact the Online Lenders Alliance Consumer Hotline immediately at: 800-299-7585 or contact MoneyMutual at: customerservice@moneymutual.com or use our toll free number at: #{controllerBean.customerServicePhoneNumber}.

MoneyMutual withdrew money from my account.

MoneyMutual is not a lender and will never withdraw any money from your account. Our service is completely FREE and we do not charge any fees.

MoneyMutual said they would give me a loan, but I was declined.

MoneyMutual is not a lender and does not make lending decisions. We do not guarantee that you will be matched with one of our participating lenders which will be determined by the information you provide. The decision whether to lend you money is at the sole discretion of the lender you are matched with. The basic requirements to be matched with a lender include but are not limited to:

  • Currently have a job (or receive regular income)
  • Make at least $800 per month
  • Are 18 years of age or older and a U.S. resident
  • Have a checking account
  • Other requirements may apply

What''s the phone number to MoneyMutual?

Our phone number is: #{controllerBean.customerServicePhoneNumber}.

We rely on feedback from our customers so that we may continually improve our services and program. If you have a complaint or your comments are not addressed here, please contact MoneyMutual at customerservice@MoneyMutual.com.

MoneyMutual Complaints

We welcome the opportunity to address any complaints, concerns or questions that you may have about our service. MoneyMutual believes that good customer service begins and ends with customer satisfaction. A satisfied customer is our best referral.

We have taken extra steps to provide you added customer support. In fact, MoneyMutual is one of the only companies in the industry to offer 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, customer support to assist our customers.

If you have a complaint, concern or a general question, please feel free to contact us via:

Email: customerservice@moneymutual.com

or

Toll free phone: #{controllerBean.customerServicePhoneNumber}.

If MoneyMutual is unable to resolve your complaint or answer your question, feel free to contact the Online Lender Alliance Consumer Hotline at 1-800-299-7585. This organization was established to ensure consumers are fully informed and fairly treated when using lending products online. We are a proud member of this association and comply with all of their best practices. To find out more information about the Online Lenders Alliance please go to www.onlinelendersalliance.org.

As with all reputable companies, we appreciate customer feedback to improve our services. Below is a list of the most common questions that we have found online or collected through customer service, with our response to each of these issues.

Is MoneyMutual a scam?

No, MoneyMutual is not a scam. We offer a legitimate service matching borrowers with lenders. MoneyMutual currently has a network of over 60 participating lenders. When you provide your information on our site, MoneyMutual will attempt to match you with a participating lender based on the information you provide. The decision whether to lend you money is at the sole discretion of the lender you are matched with.

I applied at MoneyMutual and now I am receiving threatening phone calls.

This is not due to you applying at MoneyMutual. MoneyMutual does not make collections calls and its lenders do not engage in these types of collections tactics. Under federal law, debt collectors may not abuse, use profanity or threaten you verbally or physically in connection with the collection of a debt. The Fair Debt Collection Practices Act (FDCPA) also prohibits debt collectors from lying about who they are or who they represent. You cannot be arrested for failing to pay a personal debt. If you are receiving these types of calls, please contact the Online Lenders Alliance Consumer Hotline immediately at: 800-299-7585 or contact MoneyMutual at: customerservice@moneymutual.com or use our toll free number at: #{controllerBean.customerServicePhoneNumber}.

MoneyMutual withdrew money from my account.

MoneyMutual is not a lender and will never withdraw any money from your account. Our service is completely FREE and we do not charge any fees.

MoneyMutual said they would give me a loan, but I was declined.

MoneyMutual is not a lender and does not make lending decisions. We do not guarantee that you will be matched with one of our participating lenders which will be determined by the information you provide. The decision whether to lend you money is at the sole discretion of the lender you are matched with. The basic requirements to be matched with a lender include but are not limited to:

  • Currently have a job (or receive regular income)
  • Make at least $800 per month
  • Are 18 years of age or older and a U.S. resident
  • Have a checking account
  • Other requirements may apply

What''s the phone number to MoneyMutual?

Our phone number is: #{controllerBean.customerServicePhoneNumber}.

We rely on feedback from our customers so that we may continually improve our services and program. If you have a complaint or your comments are not addressed here, please contact MoneyMutual at customerservice@MoneyMutual.com.

Terms of Web Site Use

IMPORTANT: Legal Terms of Web Site Use Page

Welcome to moneymutual.com (the "Company") Web Site (the "Site")! Your access to and use of the Site is subject to the Terms of Web Site Use set forth in this Agreement.

PLEASE READ THIS AGREEMENT CAREFULLY BEFORE ACCESSING THE SITE.

BY USING THE SITE, YOU WILL BE ACKNOWLEDGING THAT YOU HAVE READ THIS AGREEMENT AND AGREED WITHOUT LIMITATION OR QUALIFICATION, TO BE LEGALLY BOUND BY THIS AGREEMENT AND THE TERMS OF THE moneymutual.com PRIVACY POLICY.

IF YOU DO NOT WISH TO BE BOUND BY THESE Terms of Web Site Use, YOU MAY NOT ACCESS OR USE THE SITE.

THE COMPANY MAY, FROM TIME TO TIME, MAKE CHANGES OR ADDITIONS TO THIS AGREEMENT, AND YOUR CONTINUED USE OF THE SITE AFTER THE COMPANY MAKES SUCH CHANGES OR ADDITIONS WILL SIGNIFY THAT YOU AGREE TO SUCH CHANGES OR ADDITIONS. YOU SHOULD THEREFORE PERIODICALLY VISIT THIS PAGE TO REVIEW THE THEN CURRENT Terms of Web Site Use.

  1. Authorized uses. The Company, authorizes you to use this Site and to display its content but solely for your own personal noncommercial use. Any other use is strictly prohibited. You agree not to reproduce, duplicate, copy, sell, resell or exploit for any commercial purposes, any material at the Site, use of the Site, or access to the Site. By using this Site you acknowledge that you have read and understood the terms of the moneymutual.com Privacy Policy and agree to said terms.
  2. Proprietary Rights. Everything that appears on the Site is protected under the copyright laws of the United States and other countries and may not be used except as provided in these Terms of Web Site Use. The Company neither represents nor warrants that your use of materials displayed at the Site will not infringe rights of third parties.
  3. Inaccuracies at the Site. While the Company uses reasonable efforts to include accurate and up to date information at the Site, the Company makes no warranties or representations as to the Site''s accuracy. The Company disclaims any and all liability for the accuracy, completeness, or correctness of such information.
  4. Security at the Site. While the Company uses reasonable efforts to safeguard the security of the Site, there can be no guaranty that such safeguards will successfully prevent unauthorized alterations in the content or functionality of the Site. The Company assumes no liability or responsibility for any unauthorized alterations in the content or functionality of the Site.
  5. Disclaimer of Warranties. Neither the Company nor any other party involved in creating, producing, or delivering the Site makes any representations about the suitability of the content of this Site for any purpose, nor that your use of the Site will be uninterrupted or error-free. EVERYTHING ON THIS SITE IS PROVIDED TO YOU "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, OR NON-INFRINGEMENT. Please note that some jurisdictions may not allow the exclusions of implied warranties, so some of the above exclusions may not apply to you. Check your local laws for any restrictions or limitations regarding the exclusion of implied warranties.
  6. Limitation of Liabilities. Neither the Company nor any other party involved in creating, producing, or delivering the Site assumes any responsibility, and shall not be liable for, any damages to, or viruses that may infect, your computer equipment or other property on account of your access to, use of, or browsing in the Site or your downloading of any materials, data, text, images, video, or audio from this Site. Your use of and browsing in the Site are at your risk. NO SUCH PARTY SHALL BE LIABLE FOR ANY INCIDENTAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, SPECIAL, INDIRECT, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF YOUR ACCESS TO, OR USE OF, THE SITE. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COMPANYS TOTAL LIABILITY TO YOU FOR ALL DAMAGES, LOSSES, AND CAUSES OF ACTION WHETHER IN CONTRACT, WARRANTY, TORT (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, NEGLIGENCE), STRICT LIABILITY OR OTHERWISE, EXCEED THE AMOUNT PAID BY YOU, IF ANY, FOR ACCESSING THIS SITE.
  7. Content Submitted or Made Available for Inclusion at the Site. Any unsolicited communication or material that you transmit to the Site by electronic mail or otherwise, including any data, questions, comments, suggestions, or the like is, and will be treated as, non-confidential and non-proprietary. Any unsolicited communication or material that you transmit or post may be used by the Company or its affiliates for any purpose, including, but not limited to, reproduction, disclosure, transmission, publication, broadcasting, distribution or posting. Furthermore, the Company will be free to use any ideas, concepts, know-how, or techniques contained in any unsolicited communication or material that you send to the Site for any purpose whatsoever including, but not limited to developing, manufacturing and marketing products using such information.
  8. Images of People or Places. Images of people or places displayed on the Site are either the property of, or used with permission by, the Company. Any unauthorized use of the images may violate copyright laws, trademark laws, the laws of privacy and publicity, and communications regulations and statutes.
  9. Trademark Information. The trademarks, logos, and service marks (collectively the "Trademarks") displayed on the Site, are registered and unregistered Trademarks of the Company and others. Nothing contained on the Site should be construed as granting, by implication, estoppel, or otherwise, any license or right to use any Trademark displayed on the Site without the written permission of the Company or such third party that may own the Trademarks displayed on the Site. Your use of the Trademarks displayed on the Site, or any other content on the Site, except as provided in these Terms of Web Site Use, is strictly prohibited. You are also advised the Company will aggressively enforce its intellectual property rights to the fullest extent of the law, including the seeking of criminal prosecution.
  10. Links. The Company has not reviewed any sites that may be linked to the Site and is not responsible for the content of any off-site pages or any other sites linked to the Site. Your linking to any other off-site pages or other sites is at your own risk.
  11. Conduct of Site Visitors.   12. Dealings with Advertisers. Your correspondence or business dealings with, or participation in promotions of, advertisers found on or through the Site, including payment and delivery of related goods or services, and any other terms, conditions, warranties or representations associated with such dealings, are solely between you and such advertiser. You agree that the Company shall not be responsible or liable for any loss or damage of any sort incurred as the result of any such dealings or as the result of the presence of such advertisers on the Site.

  14. International Use. You agree that you will not use any robot, spider, Web crawler, screen scraper, automated query program or other automatic device or manual process to monitor or copy our web pages or the content contained herein without our prior expressed written permission. This Agreement sets forth the entire understanding and agreement between us with respect to the subject matter hereof.

Money Mutual > Payday Loans > Legitimate Online Lenders
  • Payday Loans
    • Same Day Payday Loans
    • Instant Payday Loans
    • Payday Loans Online
    • How Short Term Loans Work
    • How Payday Loans Work
    • What are Faxless Payday Loans
    • Types of Payday Loans
    • Legitimate Lenders Online
    • Online Advantages
    • Fast Payday Loans Online
    • How To Qualify
  • Cash Advance
  • Bad Credit Loans
  • Montel Williams
 

Characteristics Of A Legitimate Payday Loan Site

Safety and security are big concerns for most people who use the web on a regular basis. Unfortunately, there are people on the web who also want to trick you into visiting fake sites designed to install bad software on your computer or steal your information. These scammers create realistic-looking payday loan sites that are in fact criminal in nature. In fact, scammers have become sneaky enough to make sites that are difficult to tell are fake. Here are a few clues that a potential loan site could be untrustworthy:

  • Look for "https" in the website address: No matter what web browser you use, in the address bar you can see every site address begin as "http" in order to point you where the site is. For sites that have been built securely, you will see an "s" at the end, making the address start with "https." The "s" indicates that the site is on a secure server, and your connection to it is safe. If you''re going to visit a site that will collect any personal information, always double-check that the address in the address bar starts with "https" before submitting anything.
  • Also look out for the image of a lock on your browser: One simple way to check if a site is secure is to look for a lock image that should appear near the address bar near the top of your browser. For Internet Explorer users, the lock is on the right side of the address bar, and Chrome and Firefox users will see it on the left side. A lock icon (it''s usually green) will show you that the site you''re visiting is secure.
"scammers have become sneaky enough to make sites that are difficult to tell are fake"

  • Clickable security logos: One of the moves that fake sites make is using the logos of trusted online security and privacy companies – logos that aren''t clickable – in order to lure you into a false sense of security. In fact, if the logos aren''t clickable, beware. Websites that are truly secure and that keep your information private should gladly link to the services that keep their customers'' information secure and private. Clicking on these images should show you how companies are working together to keep you protected.
  • Warnings about unsafe information transfers: Each website is different, but many of them will have both secure and unsecure pages on them – which means you should be extra careful. Most browsers will send you a pop-up window to warn you that certain pages may not be secure and if you want to continue. Always make sure you know what kind of page you''re on and what kind of page you''re clicking to. Legitimate sites will make sure that any and all pages that take personal information are secure.

Privacy and security are essential at Money Mutual. When you use our website to help get matched with our network of participating lenders, we always take steps to make sure that your information is kept safe. Participating lenders in our network who have agreed to abide by our Code of Lender Conduct will help to ensure that your information is safe and private.

When you''re looking for emergency cash, don''t be fooled by the fake sites trying to steal your money or information. Reputable payday loan sites should be looking out for their customers to make sure their information isn''t stolen. Always be on the lookout for what''s in a safe site!

', 1, GETDATE(), GETDATE()); DELETE FROM Article WHERE ArticleId = 2600799074987339524; INSERT INTO Article ([ArticleId] ,[DateCreated] ,[DateModified] ,[ArticlePageId] ,[Title] ,[MetaDescription] ,[MetaKeywords] ,[HeaderImageAltText] ,[HtmlContentId] ,[ManagementApproved] ,[LegalApproved] ,[Author] ,[Revision] ,[UrlAccessible] ,[LiveAccessible] ,[WebsiteId] ,[PageName] ,[HeaderContent] ,[MainTemplate] ,[MobileTemplate] ,[ModalTemplate] ,[MobileUserExperienceId] ,[SerializedArticleRegions] ) VALUES (2600799074987339524 ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,NULL ,'Finding Legitimate Payday Loan Sites Online | MoneyMutual' ,'Finding a legitimate payday loan site online is not always easy. We outline what you should look for before you apply for a loan or cash advance online.' ,'Legitimate Payday Loans Online, Legitimate Payday Loan Lenders, Real Payday Lenders Online, Real Payday Loan Sites, Legitimate Loans Online, Real Payday Loans, Payday Loans' ,'' ,3159437455290501858 ,1 ,1 ,'david.maple' ,1 ,1 ,1 ,5484604087494250496 ,'payday-loans/legitimate-lenders-online' ,'' ,'/templates/Silo.xhtml' ,'/mobile/MobileSilo.xhtml' ,'/templates/ModalArticleTemplate.xhtml' ,NULL ,'' ); -- test article DELETE FROM HtmlContent WHERE HtmlContentId = 687735195787886826; INSERT INTO HtmlContent (HtmlContentId, Name, Text, Active, DateCreated, DateModified) VALUES (687735195787886826, 'Article Test: 687735195787886826', '

Unfortunately, there are people on the web who also want to trick you into visiting fake sites designed to install bad software on your computer or steal your information. These scammers create realistic-looking payday loan sites that are in fact criminal in nature. In fact, scammers have become sneaky enough to make sites that are difficult to tell are fake. Here are a few clues that a potential loan site could be untrustworthy:

  • Look for "https" in the website address: No matter what web browser you use, in the address bar you can see every site address begin as "http" in order to point you where the site is. For sites that have been built securely, you will see an "s" at the end, making the address start with "https." The "s" indicates that the site is on a secure server, and your connection to it is safe. If you''re going to visit a site that will collect any personal information, always double-check that the address in the address bar starts with "https" before submitting anything.

A lock icon (it''s usually green) will show you that the site you''re visiting is secure.
"scammers have become sneaky enough to make sites that are difficult to tell are fake"

Clicking on these images should show you how companies are working together to keep you protected.

Most browsers will send you a pop-up window to warn you that certain pages may not be secure and if you want to continue. Always make sure you know what kind of page you''re on and what kind of page you''re clicking to. Legitimate sites will make sure that any and all pages that take personal information are secure.

Privacy and security are essential at Money Mutual. Bad Credit OK

Do you have an unexpected car repair? Maybe you have an unexpectedly large bill due, and your next payday is too far away? At Money Mutual, we can help you get matched with one of the largest lending networks in the country – safely, quickly, and securely – from your phone.

How does Money Mutual work? Easy! It takes mere minutes to provide all the appropriate information, and if we''re able to match you with a lender, you could be approved in moments. If you''re matched with a lender from our dedicated network, and you''re approved, you could receive up to $1000* in as little as 24 hours. We make getting matched with a lender on your phone quick, safe, and secure.

The best part is that you don''t have to wait in line! Helping to match you with one of our participating lenders from your phone means you don’t have to go to the store and stand forever in line to get the cash you need. Getting matched with a lender is only a few finger presses away!

The evolution of smartphones has made it simpler than ever to get the emergency cash you''re looking for. Money Mutual helps connect you with one of the largest lending networks in the country, all from the ease of your phone. Let us help you get matched so you can get the funds you need to get on with your life.

Only 4 Minutes to Apply

Do you have an unexpected car repair? Maybe you have an unexpectedly large bill due, and your next payday is too far away? At Money Mutual, we can help you get matched with one of the largest lending networks in the country – safely, quickly, and securely – from your phone.

How does Money Mutual work? Easy! It takes mere minutes to provide all the appropriate information, and if we''re able to match you with a lender, you could be approved in moments. If you''re matched with a lender from our dedicated network, and you''re approved, you could receive up to $1000* in as little as 24 hours. We make getting matched with a lender on your phone quick, safe, and secure.

The best part is that you don''t have to wait in line! Helping to match you with one of our participating lenders from your phone means you don’t have to go to the store and stand forever in line to get the cash you need. Getting matched with a lender is only a few finger presses away!

The evolution of smartphones has made it simpler than ever to get the emergency cash you''re looking for. Money Mutual helps connect you with one of the largest lending networks in the country, all from the ease of your phone. Let us help you get matched so you can get the funds you need to get on with your life.

Cash Before Payday

Do you have an unexpected car repair? Maybe you have an unexpectedly large bill due, and your next payday is too far away? At Money Mutual, we can help you get matched with one of the largest lending networks in the country – safely, quickly, and securely – from your phone.

How does Money Mutual work? Easy! It takes mere minutes to provide all the appropriate information, and if we''re able to match you with a lender, you could be approved in moments. If you''re matched with a lender from our dedicated network, and you''re approved, you could receive up to $1000* in as little as 24 hours. We make getting matched with a lender on your phone quick, safe, and secure.

The best part is that you don''t have to wait in line! Helping to match you with one of our participating lenders from your phone means you don’t have to go to the store and stand forever in line to get the cash you need. Getting matched with a lender is only a few finger presses away!

The evolution of smartphones has made it simpler than ever to get the emergency cash you''re looking for. Money Mutual helps connect you with one of the largest lending networks in the country, all from the ease of your phone. Let us help you get matched so you can get the funds you need to get on with your life.

Why MoneyMutual®

Do you have an unexpected car repair? Maybe you have an unexpectedly large bill due, and your next payday is too far away? At Money Mutual, we can help you get matched with one of the largest lending networks in the country – safely, quickly, and securely – from your phone.

How does Money Mutual work? Easy! It takes mere minutes to provide all the appropriate information, and if we''re able to match you with a lender, you could be approved in moments. If you''re matched with a lender from our dedicated network, and you''re approved, you could receive up to $1000* in as little as 24 hours. We make getting matched with a lender on your phone quick, safe, and secure.

The best part is that you don''t have to wait in line! Helping to match you with one of our participating lenders from your phone means you don’t have to go to the store and stand forever in line to get the cash you need. Getting matched with a lender is only a few finger presses away!

The evolution of smartphones has made it simpler than ever to get the emergency cash you''re looking for. Money Mutual helps connect you with one of the largest lending networks in the country, all from the ease of your phone. Let us help you get matched so you can get the funds you need to get on with your life.

Why MoneyMutual®

Do you have an unexpected car repair? Maybe you have an unexpectedly large bill due, and your next payday is too far away? At Money Mutual, we can help you get matched with one of the largest lending networks in the country – safely, quickly, and securely – from your phone.

How does Money Mutual work? Easy! It takes mere minutes to provide all the appropriate information, and if we''re able to match you with a lender, you could be approved in moments. If you''re matched with a lender from our dedicated network, and you''re approved, you could receive up to $1000* in as little as 24 hours. We make getting matched with a lender on your phone quick, safe, and secure.

The best part is that you don''t have to wait in line! Helping to match you with one of our participating lenders from your phone means you don’t have to go to the store and stand forever in line to get the cash you need. Getting matched with a lender is only a few finger presses away!

The evolution of smartphones has made it simpler than ever to get the emergency cash you''re looking for. Money Mutual helps connect you with one of the largest lending networks in the country, all from the ease of your phone. Let us help you get matched so you can get the funds you need to get on with your life.

Private & Discreet

Do you have an unexpected car repair? Maybe you have an unexpectedly large bill due, and your next payday is too far away? At Money Mutual, we can help you get matched with one of the largest lending networks in the country – safely, quickly, and securely – from your phone.

How does Money Mutual work? Easy! It takes mere minutes to provide all the appropriate information, and if we''re able to match you with a lender, you could be approved in moments. If you''re matched with a lender from our dedicated network, and you''re approved, you could receive up to $1000* in as little as 24 hours. We make getting matched with a lender on your phone quick, safe, and secure.

The best part is that you don''t have to wait in line! Helping to match you with one of our participating lenders from your phone means you don’t have to go to the store and stand forever in line to get the cash you need. Getting matched with a lender is only a few finger presses away!

Do you have an unexpected car repair? Maybe you have an unexpectedly large bill due, and your next payday is too far away? At Money Mutual, we can help you get matched with one of the largest lending networks in the country – safely, quickly, and securely – from your phone.

How does Money Mutual work? Easy! It takes mere minutes to provide all the appropriate information, and if we''re able to match you with a lender, you could be approved in moments. If you''re matched with a lender from our dedicated network, and you''re approved, you could receive up to $1000* in as little as 24 hours. We make getting matched with a lender on your phone quick, safe, and secure.

The best part is that you don''t have to wait in line! Helping to match you with one of our participating lenders from your phone means you don’t have to go to the store and stand forever in line to get the cash you need. Getting matched with a lender is only a few finger presses away!

The evolution of smartphones has made it simpler than ever to get the emergency cash you''re looking for. Money Mutual helps connect you with one of the largest lending networks in the country, all from the ease of your phone. Let us help you get matched so you can get the funds you need to get on with your life.

Why have over a million people turned to MoneyMutual?

• Approval for up to $1,000 directly deposited as soon as tomorrow*: Once you''ve provided the lender with all your information, the approval process is typically very fast. You could have up to $1000 directly deposited into your bank account in as little as 24 hours.

Our easy online form takes less than 5 minutes to complete: With just a few bits of simple information, you could be matched with a lender in minutes.

• Exclusively endorsed by Montel Williams: Celebrated talk show host and Daytime Emmy Award winner Montel Williams allies himself with products that help people live better -- physically, spiritually, financially and emotionally. He knows that the economic downturn has left many individuals with upside down credit and difficult-to-pay expenses – and he understands that a cash advance loan can provide quick needed assistance and help avoid more costly fees.

• Verisign 128-Bit encryption for your safety and security: As the trusted name in online encryption, this site uses Verisign''s 128-bit encryption to protect the transmission of your information.

• Proud member of the Online Lenders Alliance: As a trade organization for the online lending industry, the OLA is dedicated to ensuring that customers are fully informed and fairly treated.

• 24/7 customer service: Our goal is to be the leader in providing the best customer service in the industry. If you have any questions, we are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week by phone or email.

How does it work?

MoneyMutual is a lending network, NOT a lender. Our service is completely free and all repayment terms are between you and the lender. Each lender has different loan terms, such as the loan amount, the APR for the loan, repayment schedules, etc.

After submitting your information, if you are matched with a lender, MoneyMutual will redirect to the lender''s web site where you will be able to review loan terms and conditions. In many cases, the lender will then contact you to confirm your personal information and finalize the loan. They may contact you via telephone, email, text messages, etc. Please make sure that you respond in a timely manner to ensure that funds are deposited as quickly as possible.

What is the APR?

Since Money Mutual is a lending network and not a lender, we aren''t able to offer you an exact loan APR; however, the typical representative APR range is from XXX% to XXXX%. Since short-term loans are meant to be used for very small periods of time, we believe that APR rates aren''t an effective measure of usefulness.

What happens if I''m late paying back the loan?

If you are matched with a lender and accept the terms and conditions of their loan offer, you are agreeing to pay that loan back. Partial payment, non-payment, or late payment of your loan may result in additional fees, legal collection action, or you possibly being reported to a consumer reporting agency. Renewal policies are different for every lender. As a convenience to you, some lenders may agree to alternative payment options. Some of these options may result in a renewed loan and additional loan fees. Please make sure to review your lender''s renewal policies, and make your payment preferences known to your lender. If you have questions or need more information on renewal policies, please contact your lender directly.

Why have over a million people turned to MoneyMutual?

• Approval for up to $1,000 directly deposited as soon as tomorrow*: Once you''ve provided the lender with all your information, the approval process is typically very fast. You could have up to $1000 directly deposited into your bank account in as little as 24 hours.

Our easy online form takes less than 5 minutes to complete: With just a few bits of simple information, you could be matched with a lender in minutes.

• Exclusively endorsed by Montel Williams: Celebrated talk show host and Daytime Emmy Award winner Montel Williams allies himself with products that help people live better -- physically, spiritually, financially and emotionally. He knows that the economic downturn has left many individuals with upside down credit and difficult-to-pay expenses – and he understands that a cash advance loan can provide quick needed assistance and help avoid more costly fees.

  • Montel Williams
 

Unsecured Bad Credit Installment Loan


When you''re looking online for a loan, you may find a variety of choices out there. One type of loan you may find is an unsecured bad credit installment loan. This kind of loan may be useful when you need your car repaired or have an unforeseen bill due.

One of the features of unsecured installment loans – even with bad credit -- is that you may not have to put up collateral for the loan. For many kinds of loans people are required to put up some kind of collateral in order to secure the loan. If the person ends up defaulting on the loan, they could lose their collateral. However, unsecured bad credit loans work differently. If you''re approved for the loan, and you accept the loan offer, the cash would be directly deposited to your banking account, without putting up collateral.

However, there is one downside to unsecured loans. When no collateral is involved, traditional lenders such as credit unions and banks usually require you to have good credit before offering an installment loan. That disqualifies thousands of people who have bad credit, often through no fault of their own. Setbacks such as a job loss, medical problems or divorce can contribute to hurting someone’s credit. Fortunately, some lenders specializing in bad credit installment loans understand people have bad credit situations that aren''t their fault, and may be willing to offer loans when they need cash.

"Personal installment loans are loans that you repay with fixed payments over a period of time"
Depending on your situation, MoneyMutual may be able to match you with a participating lender offering installment loans for those with less than perfect credit. MoneyMutual is not a bank or lender and is not involved in the credit decision process. However, through MoneyMutual.com, it’s possible to be matched with a participating lender within MoneyMutual’s network who may approve you for a loan. Furthermore, our services are completely free.

Personal installment loans are loans that you repay with fixed payments over a period of time, often a number of months. Most of the time, your ability to make payments through regular income (like a monthly retirement check or regular job) will help determine how much you can borrow. Payday loans, on the other hand, typically require payment on your next payday.

The online search for a loan can mean you run into a number of choices. For those who have fallen into bad credit through no fault of their own, unsecured bad credit installment loans may be the alternative they''re looking for when they need cash for an unforeseen circumstance.

', 1, GETDATE(), GETDATE()); DELETE FROM Article WHERE ArticleId = 1884549929007288475; INSERT INTO Article ([ArticleId] ,[DateCreated] ,[DateModified] ,[ArticlePageId] ,[Title] ,[MetaDescription] ,[MetaKeywords] ,[HeaderImageAltText] ,[HtmlContentId] ,[ManagementApproved] ,[LegalApproved] ,[Author] ,[Revision] ,[UrlAccessible] ,[LiveAccessible] ,[WebsiteId] ,[PageName] ,[HeaderContent] ,[MainTemplate] ,[MobileTemplate] ,[ModalTemplate] ,[MobileUserExperienceId] ,[SerializedArticleRegions] ) VALUES (1884549929007288475 ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,NULL ,'Need Unsecured Bad Credit Installment Loans? | Money Mutual' ,'Learn more about unsecured bad credit installment loans at MoneyMutual. Unsecured personal loan with bad credit history can get matched with the right lender.' ,'Unsecured Personal Loan with Bad Credit, Unsecured Loan with Bad Credit, Bad Credit Installment Loans, Bad Credit Loans, Money Mutual, Installment Loans' ,'' ,1253814255961767303 ,1 ,1 ,'david.maple' ,1 ,1 ,1 ,5484604087494250496 ,'bad-credit-loans/installment-unsecured' ,'' ,'/templates/Silo.xhtml' ,'/mobile/MobileSilo.xhtml' ,'/templates/ModalArticleTemplate.xhtml' ,3226773266688846570 ,'' ); -- test article DELETE FROM HtmlContent WHERE HtmlContentId = 1688523316279374474; INSERT INTO HtmlContent (HtmlContentId, Name, Text, Active, DateCreated, DateModified) VALUES (1688523316279374474, 'Article Test: 1688523316279374474', '

  • Montel Williams
 

Unsecured Bad Credit Installment Loan

However, unsecured bad credit loans work differently. However, there is one downside to unsecured loans. When no collateral is involved, traditional lenders such as credit unions and banks usually require you to have good credit before offering an installment loan. That disqualifies thousands of people who have bad credit, often through no fault of their own. Setbacks such as a job loss, medical problems or divorce can contribute to hurting someone’s credit. Fortunately, some lenders specializing in bad credit installment loans understand people have bad credit situations that aren''t their fault, and may be willing to offer loans when they need cash.

"Personal installment loans are loans that you repay with fixed payments over a period of time"
Depending on your situation, MoneyMutual may be able to match you with a participating lender offering installment loans for those with less than perfect credit. MoneyMutual is not a bank or lender and is not involved in the credit decision process. However, through MoneyMutual.com, it’s possible to be matched with a participating lender within MoneyMutual’s network who may approve you for a loan. Furthermore, our services are completely free.

Personal installment loans are loans that you repay with fixed payments over a period of time, often a number of months. Most of the time, your ability to make payments through regular income (like a monthly retirement check or regular job) will help determine how much you can borrow. Payday loans, on the other hand, typically require payment on your next payday.

The online search for a loan can mean you run into a number of choices. For those who have fallen into bad credit through no fault of their own, unsecured bad credit installment loans may be the alternative they''re looking for when they need cash for an unforeseen circumstance.

Money Mutual > Bad Credit Loans > Qualify for Payday Loans With Bad Credit
  • Payday Loans
  • Cash Advance
  • Bad Credit Loans
    • Qualify for Payday Loans With Bad Credit
    • Payday Loans With Bad Credit?
    • Bad Credit Loans
    • Unsecured Installment Loans
    • Online Unsecured Installment Loans
    • Loans With Bad Credit
    • Guaranteed Bad Credit Loans

    • Can You Get a Short Term Loan?
    • Emergency Loans
    • Types of Bad Credit Loans
    • Are There Loans If You Have Bad Credit?
  • Montel Williams
 

Do I Qualify for Bad Credit Payday Loans?


If you''re in an emergency situation and are afraid to take out a loan due to your credit score, you don''t have to be. With the economy affecting so many families out there, you are not alone in needing cash when an unforeseen circumstance happens. Even if you have bad credit, there are options out there – like bad credit payday loans -- to get you the money you need.

Here at MoneyMutual.com, we provide access to lenders offering payday loans to good folks who have struggled with bad credit because of unemployment, illness or other issues. We can help match you with a lender specializing in payday loans that may approve you for a much-needed loan, even if you have issues with bad credit.

"Payday loan lenders realize that even people with bad credit sometimes need a little extra cash to handle unexpected expenses"
Standards can vary by individual lender, but it''s possible that you may not have to go through a credit check for approval on a payday loan. That means you can get the money you need fast for emergencies such as car repairs or to pay rent. Payday loan lenders realize that even people with bad credit sometimes need a little extra cash to handle unexpected expenses. We are not a lender and do not broker loans -- instead, we help to match you to a variety of bad credit payday loan lenders who are likely to understand your bad credit problems and quickly review your loan application. Using MoneyMutual.com to find a bad credit payday loan lender is absolutely free.

Payday loan lenders will ask you to meet certain requirements, such as being able to show an ability to repay the loan, and requirements can differ depending on the lender. For example, you may need to show proof of employment – such as a recent paystub – or other regular income such as a pension check.  Be aware there also may be other requirements, such as having an active checking account.  Terms may vary by the lender, but typically you’ll be asked to repay the loan on your next payday. Make sure you read the terms and conditions of your loan very carefully before you decide to accept. MoneyMutual encourages you to borrow responsibly and carefully examine your ability to repay before you accept a bad credit payday loan offer.
 

Having bad credit doesn''t have to mean you can''t take out a loan when the unexpected happens. There are choices out there for you when you need cash, even if you have bad credit. We can help match you to a lender who may be able to approve you no matter what kind of emergency arises.

  • Montel Williams
 

Same Day Payday Loans


Have you gone online to try and find a loan? You may have found it to be very confusing. After all, the amount of real and fake offers for fast cash – including 1-hour cash advance loans – can sound like they''re legitimate. And though it may be true that the approval process for getting a loan does feel like you''re getting a same day payday loan, in real life the process is very similar to the familiar practice of depositing a check at your local bank.

You might already be used to the check-depositing process and know that the funds from the check aren''t immediately posted to your account. Usually the bank will hold the check for at least 24 hours to make sure that the funds from the check''s issuer are available to be deposited. After at least 24 hours, if the funds are available, they''re deposited into your account for you to use however you like. The process for getting a loan online is very similar: if you''re approved for a loan, it''s possible the funds could be deposited into your bank account in as little as 24 hours.

If you see promises of "same day payday loans" or "1 hour cash advance loans" online, beware of the fine print. If you''re looking for funds for any kind of emergency situation, you want to get matched with lenders who will treat you with fairness and respect.

"get matched with lenders who will treat you with fairness and respect"
Money Mutual was created to give borrowers a better chance at getting a payday loan, quickly, by providing one of the largest lender networks in the U.S. Filling out the forms at our website is very quick, and if you''re matched with a lender, they will send you all of the terms and conditions for you to read over. If you accept the terms, it''s possible you could have money deposited into your bank account in as quickly as 24 hours. While MoneyMutual is not a lender nor do we broker loans, we instead attempt to match borrowers with lenders for free.

To assure that our customers are informed and treated properly, we''ve created a Code of Lender Conduct. The lenders who take part in our network who adhere to the Code must make sure all the terms of their loan offers are laid out in a fashion that''s clear to customers. They must also be professional in answering customers'' questions, as well as agree not to sell or share their customers'' information.

If you have a sudden emergency like an unexpected bill or surprise car repair, a payday loan may be one of your options. Review your finances to decide how much money you need and are able to borrow. Keep in mind that depending on the terms, the full amount you borrow may be due on your next payday, so take some time to factor how that will affect your budget. Get in touch with your lender if the due date approaches and you’re not going to have enough money in your checking account to cover repayment. It''s possible the lender may agree to extend your loan; but, keep in mind that additional fees and finance charges may apply.

When you go online to look for a personal loan, don''t get distracted by promises of "same day payday loans." Make sure you are matched with a reputable lender for free at MoneyMutual.com. Remember, make sure you take your time and use payday loans responsibly. If you are offered a loan, read over all the terms and conditions carefully before accepting the loan.

', 1, GETDATE(), GETDATE()); DELETE FROM Article WHERE ArticleId = 2902058094678381977; INSERT INTO Article ([ArticleId] ,[DateCreated] ,[DateModified] ,[ArticlePageId] ,[Title] ,[MetaDescription] ,[MetaKeywords] ,[HeaderImageAltText] ,[HtmlContentId] ,[ManagementApproved] ,[LegalApproved] ,[Author] ,[Revision] ,[UrlAccessible] ,[LiveAccessible] ,[WebsiteId] ,[PageName] ,[HeaderContent] ,[MainTemplate] ,[MobileTemplate] ,[ModalTemplate] ,[MobileUserExperienceId] ,[SerializedArticleRegions] ) VALUES (2902058094678381977 ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,NULL ,'How to Get Same Day Payday Loans Online | Money Mutual' ,'How do you get a same day payday loan? Same Day Payday Loans


Have you gone online to try and find a loan? You may have found it to be very confusing. After all, the amount of real and fake offers for fast cash – including 1-hour cash advance loans – can sound like they''re legitimate. You might already be used to the check-depositing process and know that the funds from the check aren''t immediately posted to your account. Usually the bank will hold the check for at least 24 hours to make sure that the funds from the check''s issuer are available to be deposited. The process for getting a loan online is very similar: if you''re approved for a loan, it''s possible the funds could be deposited into your bank account in as little as 24 hours.

"get matched with lenders who will treat you with fairness and respect"

If you accept the terms, it''s possible you could have money deposited into your bank account in as quickly as 24 hours. They must also be professional in answering customers'' questions, as well as agree not to sell or share their customers'' information.

When you go online to look for a personal loan, don''t get distracted by promises of "same day payday loans." Make sure you are matched with a reputable lender for free at MoneyMutual.com. Remember, make sure you take your time and use payday loans responsibly. If you are offered a loan, read over all the terms and conditions carefully before accepting the loan.

No Fax Cash Advance


Before the rise of e-commerce on the Internet, many people who wanted to get a loan usually had to contact a lender by telephone or in person, and when asked for documentation to fill requirements requested by the lender (like a pay stub or other evidence of regular income), they had to provide a copy or use a fax machine to send the information over to them. These days, with the advent of the Internet, it''s become easier than ever to look for cash advance loans online, often without having to use a fax to submit your information to a lender – sometimes referred to as a no fax cash advance.

In most cases, in order to qualify for a cash advance loan, lenders require proof of regular income as well as proof of a checking account in order for funds to be directly deposited. Requirements vary from lender to lender, and other conditions may apply.

These two items are important. Your pay stub confirms to the lender that you have regular employment which is important for the lender to make a decision as to whether you can repay the cash advance loan. The banking information you supply allows the lender to deposit the cash advance directly into your checking account. As agreed in your loan agreement, be aware that your lender may also deduct money directly from the account to repay the advance, including fees and finance charges.

"it''s become easier than ever to look for cash advance loans online"

If you have the correct documentation, filling out the form at MoneyMutual can take mere minutes, and approval can be made quickly. MoneyMutual is not a lender or broker and does not make lending decisions. However, MoneyMutual may be able to match you with a participating lender in MoneyMutual’s network of lenders, based on the information you provide. Many of the participating lenders in the MoneyMutual network do not require document to be faxed. The advantage of going online for a no fax cash advance is that if you''re approved, money could be deposited in your account in as little as 24 hours.

If you''re approved for a loan, make sure you read over the terms and conditions of your offer carefully. Included in the terms will be any fees, charges, and payment due dates for the loan, among other important information. If you have any kind of question about your loan offer, be sure to contact the lender directly. Always remember to borrow responsibly.

The Internet has changed the way people go to lenders for their loans. Before the Web, standing in a long line for a so-called no fax cash advance was a common occurrence. Now, it''s easier than ever to go online and use MoneyMutual to help get you matched with a participating lender within its large network of short-term lenders.

These two items are important. Money Mutual > Bad Credit Loans > Payday Loans with Bad Credit
  • Payday Loans
  • Cash Advance
  • Bad Credit Loans
    • Qualify for Payday Loans With Bad Credit
    • Payday Loans With Bad Credit?

    • Are There Loans If You Have Bad Credit?
  • Montel Williams
 

Payday Loans with Bad Credit


Many people who have had some financial problems dread applying for a loan because they know their credit is poor. Bad credit leads to frustration and even shame. When an emergency happens, like an unexpected bill due or medical crisis, people feel like they can''t get a personal loan online quickly because the economy has had a negative impact on their credit. But you don''t have to feel shameful about inquiring about a payday loan with bad credit. There are lenders out there who understand bad credit situations and may be able to help you get emergency cash with bad credit payday loans. The best part is that you can apply online – without waiting in a long line at the payday store.

 

To qualify for a bad credit payday loan you must be at least 18 years old, and have consistent employment or other steady income such as a monthly pension. A bank or credit union checking account is also required in most cases, and other conditions and lender requirements may apply.

 

Keep in mind with these kinds of loans, you’re usually expected to repay a payday loan very quickly -- often on your next payday. When you submit your pay stub and bank account information, the lender uses those pieces of information as proof of your income. Your loan information will remain confidential, and participating lenders should not use your contact information except to communicate with you about your loan.

 

"If your credit has been badly affected by the economy, you''re not alone"
Remember, only accept a bad credit payday loan if you completely understand the terms and conditions. Money Mutual is not a lender, does not lender money or broker loans, but may be able to match you with a participating lender for free. If you are matched, you may be redirected to the lender’s website or the lender will contact you directly to complete the application process. Please use payday loans online responsibly.

 

Paying the loan back on time is important not just for the lender, but also for you. Timely payment on your loan creates a positive relationship with your lender, and can be an advantage when applying for future loans. If you think you may be late on a payment or will miss a payment entirely, contact the lender directly as soon as possible. They may be able to work with you on a new payment schedule. Be aware, however, that this may mean the loan will have new terms and conditions, so make sure to speak with your lender and get all your questions answered so you understand all the terms of the loan.

If your credit has been badly affected by the economy, you''re not alone. Having bad credit doesn''t mean you don’t have any loan options. At Money Mutual, we have one of the largest lending networks in the country, to possibly match you with a lender who may be able to get you the bad credit payday loan you need for any emergency situation.

Find information about getting a bad credit payday loan from Money Mutual.' ,'Payday Loan with Bad Credit, Bad Credit Payday Loans, Bad Credit Loans, Personal Loans Online, Payday Loans, Money Mutual' ,'' ,3492826079742340569 ,1 ,1 ,'david.maple' ,1 ,1 ,1 ,5484604087494250496 ,'bad-credit-loans/payday-loans' ,'' ,'/templates/Silo.xhtml' ,'/mobile/MobileSilo.xhtml' ,'/templates/ModalArticleTemplate.xhtml' ,3226773266688846570 ,'' ); -- test article DELETE FROM HtmlContent WHERE HtmlContentId = 1746007096802340480; INSERT INTO HtmlContent (HtmlContentId, Name, Text, Active, DateCreated, DateModified) VALUES (1746007096802340480, 'Article Test: 1746007096802340480', '

The best part is that you can apply online – without waiting in a long line at the payday store.

Keep in mind with these kinds of loans, you’re usually expected to repay a payday loan very quickly -- often on your next payday. When you submit your pay stub and bank account information, the lender uses those pieces of information as proof of your income. Your loan information will remain confidential, and participating lenders should not use your contact information except to communicate with you about your loan.

 

"If your credit has been badly affected by the economy, you''re not alone"
Remember, only accept a bad credit payday loan if you completely understand the terms and conditions. Money Mutual is not a lender, does not lender money or broker loans, but may be able to match you with a participating lender for free. If you are matched, you may be redirected to the lender’s website or the lender will contact you directly to complete the application process. Please use payday loans online responsibly.

Timely payment on your loan creates a positive relationship with your lender, and can be an advantage when applying for future loans. If you think you may be late on a payment or will miss a payment entirely, contact the lender directly as soon as possible. They may be able to work with you on a new payment schedule. Be aware, however, that this may mean the loan will have new terms and conditions, so make sure to speak with your lender and get all your questions answered so you understand all the terms of the loan.

If your credit has been badly affected by the economy, you''re not alone. Having bad credit doesn''t mean you don’t have any loan options. At Money Mutual, we have one of the largest lending networks in the country, to possibly match you with a lender who may be able to get you the bad credit payday loan you need for any emergency situation.

What are Cash Advance Installment Loans?


For some people out there, they may find themselves in an unforeseen emergency – and when they take out a loan, need to pay it off in monthly installments. Does this sound like you? One of the many loan options available is getting a cash advance installment loan. When an emergency arises, you may be able to get cash quickly and have the ability to pay the loan back over time.
 
One of the advantages of cash advance installment loans is that you may be able to qualify by simply showing proof of regular employment or income, along with other personal and banking information. Of course, qualifications vary by lender, so keep that in mind when shopping around for a loan.
 

Some people think of all installment loans as "payday loans" that require repayment when you receive your next paycheck. An example of a typical scenario for a payday loan would have you borrowing say, $300 for a badly needed car repair, and agreeing to have the $300 plus any fees and finance charges electronically deducted from your next paycheck. However, a cash advance installment loan tends to work differently. Often, when you get approval for this kind of cash advance, a lender will schedule you for monthly payments typically deducted automatically from your bank checking account.

"a cash advance installment loan may be a much better alternative"
Another advantage of cash advance installment loans is that it''s a better option for people who simply need more time to pay off the advance. When an unexpected difficulty arises and you can''t afford to pay off the loan all at once, a cash advance installment loan may be a much better alternative.

The length of a cash advance installment loan will be agreed to with your lender, although it''s good to keep in mind that you do not have to take out any loan with terms that you are not comfortable with. As with any kind of loan, make sure you read the terms and conditions of your loan very carefully and clearly understand all the terms of the loan, including the monthly payment, how many payments you must make, the due dates, and finance charges.

If you''re one of the many people who have found themselves in an unexpected difficulty, there are options. Using a cash advance installment loan may be a viable alternative if you need to pay off a loan in monthly, timely installments.

 

', 1, GETDATE(), GETDATE()); DELETE FROM Article WHERE ArticleId = 1519797705949643467; INSERT INTO Article ([ArticleId] ,[DateCreated] ,[DateModified] ,[ArticlePageId] ,[Title] ,[MetaDescription] ,[MetaKeywords] ,[HeaderImageAltText] ,[HtmlContentId] ,[ManagementApproved] ,[LegalApproved] ,[Author] ,[Revision] ,[UrlAccessible] ,[LiveAccessible] ,[WebsiteId] ,[PageName] ,[HeaderContent] ,[MainTemplate] ,[MobileTemplate] ,[ModalTemplate] ,[MobileUserExperienceId] ,[SerializedArticleRegions] ) VALUES (1519797705949643467 ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,NULL ,'What are Cash Advance Installment Loans? | MoneyMutual' ,'It is easy to get cash advance installment loans and can be paid back monthly. Money Mutual offers the best cash advance loans online with monthly installment payments.' ,'Cash Advance Installment Loans, Cash Advance Installment Payments, Cash Advance Installment, Cash Advance Loans, Money Mutual' ,'' ,2748450893630569490 ,1 ,1 ,'david.maple' ,1 ,1 ,1 ,5484604087494250496 ,'cash-advance/installment-loans' ,'' ,'/templates/Silo.xhtml' ,'/mobile/MobileSilo.xhtml' ,'/templates/ModalArticleTemplate.xhtml' ,3226773266688846570 ,'' ); -- test article DELETE FROM HtmlContent WHERE HtmlContentId = 3533939449480614984; INSERT INTO HtmlContent (HtmlContentId, Name, Text, Active, DateCreated, DateModified) VALUES (3533939449480614984, 'Article Test: 3533939449480614984', '

An example of a typical scenario for a payday loan would have you borrowing say, $300 for a badly needed car repair, and agreeing to have the $300 plus any fees and finance charges electronically deducted from your next paycheck. However, a cash advance installment loan tends to work differently. Often, when you get approval for this kind of cash advance, a lender will schedule you for monthly payments typically deducted automatically from your bank checking account.

"a cash advance installment loan may be a much better alternative"
